text: A 112-year-old Japanese man has been recognised as the world's oldest living man by the Guinness World Records. Masazo Nonaka was conferred the title after Francisco Nunez Olivera from Spain died in February aged 113. There are around 68,000 people aged 100 or more in Japan, according to government data released last year.
summary: 112 वर्ष की आयु के जापानी व्यक्ति ने दुनिया के सबसे बुजुर्ग जीवित व्यक्ति का नाम दिया

text: On April 10, 1917, Mahatma Gandhi reached Bihar's Champaran to understand the situation of farmers, who were being forced to grow indigo. When Gandhiji was asked by the Britishers to leave the district, he resisted and then got arrested. Upset over the arrest, Champaran residents protested non-violently outside the jail and other government buildings, leading to Mahatma's release.
summary: भारत के प्रथम सविनय अवज्ञा आंदोलन में क्या हुआ था?

text: Around 70 dogs in Gujarat's Panchot village own land worth millions due to a decades-old tradition of donating land to animals in the village. An informal trust controls around 21 bighas of land that has been donated to the dogs. The plots of the land are auctioned for tilling rights for a year and the money is used for sustainability.
summary: गुजरात गाँव में कुत्तों की ज़मीन लाखों की है

text: A man hailing from Uttar Pradesh was arrested in Mumbai for allegedly stealing a state-owned MSRTC bus with passengers on board to drive to his village, police said. However, he lost vehicle's control within minutes and rammed it into a tree. Locals pulled him out and thrashed him, while the bus driver will be suspended for leaving the door unlocked.
summary: आदमी महा सरकार की बस चुराता है, तीन मिनट बाद उसे रोक देता है

text: In an open letter to comedian Kapil Sharma, his former manager Neeti Simoes wrote, "You...are being misled by 'friends' around you...Like you said to us and cried last month 'you are trapped'." She added that she and her sister Preeti Simoes, Kapil's ex-girlfriend, are ready to clarify matters with Kapil when he is not under the influence of alcohol.
summary: कपिल ने रोते हुए कहा कि वह फंस गया है: कॉमेडियन के पूर्व प्रबंधक

text: A class action lawsuit has been launched against Facebook, Cambridge Analytica and two other companies by British and US lawyers over alleged misuse of the personal data of over 7 crore people. The lawsuit claims the firms developed "political propaganda campaigns" in the UK and the US by obtaining users' private information from the social media network.
summary: एफबी, कैम्ब्रिज एनालिटिका के खिलाफ क्लास एक्शन का मुकदमा

text: Mocking Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath, Congress has posted a video on what his browser history could be. Using news clips on Kasganj violence and the death of 63 children at a Gorakhpur hospital, the video shows Adityanath searching for "How to ensure social disharmony", "How to bring bad governance" and ends with "How to make Yogi PM in 2019".
summary: यूपी सीएम योगी के ब्राउजर इतिहास पर कांग्रेस ने मॉक वीडियो पोस्ट किया

text: Slamming states and the Centre for utilising around Ã¢ÂÂ¹1 lakh crore meant for protecting the environment and people's welfare for other purposes, the Supreme Court on Tuesday said, "We are being befooled by the executive." Reprimanding the Odisha government for spending "people's funds" on governance issues, the apex court accused the executive of breaching trust and not following instructions.
summary: हमें कार्यपालिका द्वारा फंड किया जा रहा है: फंड उपयोग पर एससी

text: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Tuesday used the word 'lalochezia' to slam trolls on the micro-blogging site. Reacting to the difficult words Tharoor is known for sharing, a user tweeted, "Sir you are helping me a lot in my GRE preparation," while another wrote, "Start 'word of the day' on Twitter, it'll be more popular than 'Good morning' on WhatsApp."
summary: थरूर ने ट्विटर पर ट्रोल किया नया शब्द 'लललोचिया'

text: A 10-year-old boy raised an alarm after falling out of the window of his school bus when it fell into a deep gorge in Himachal Pradesh, killing 29 people. The boy climbed the gorge using sticks and grass and informed people about the accident after reaching the road. Reports said locals saved ten lives after he raised alarm.
summary: हिमाचल बस हादसे से बचने के बाद 10 साल का बढ़ा अलार्म

text: US President Donald Trump on Monday said that the "poor" US leadership of the past "allowed" China to take advantage of the country. This comes amid the ongoing tensions between the two countries over trade tariffs. However, Trump said, "I'm very good friends with Chinese President Xi Jinping...I think we will maintain that relationship."
summary: चीन ने अतीत में 'खराब' अमेरिकी नेतृत्व से प्राप्त किया: ट्रम्प

text: US President Donald Trump's Homeland Security Adviser Tom Bossert has resigned, White House press Secretary Sarah Sanders said on Tuesday. "The president wishes Tom well and is grateful for his commitment to the safety and security of our great country," she added. Bossert served in the White House since Trump's inauguration.
summary: होमलैंड सिक्योरिटी एडवाइजर ने नवीनतम शीर्ष अमेरिकी सरकार को इस्तीफा देने के लिए सहयोगी बनाया

text: A project called 'Songwriters Fonts' has created a font based on handwritten letters and notes of late singer-songwriter Kurt Cobain. "Songwriting is about inspiration...The songwriters fonts have been created to give musicians inspiration," the font creators said. They also created handwriting fonts of other singer-songwriters including David Bowie, John Lennon, and Leonard Cohen.
summary: गायक कर्ट कोबेन की लिखावट फ़ॉन्ट में बदल गई

text: IT industry body Nasscom on Tuesday said it appointed Wipro's Chief Strategy Officer and board member Rishad Premji as its Chairman for 2018-19. Premji was the Vice Chairman for 2017-18 and has been a member of Nasscom's Executive Council. Notably, Rishad Premji is the son of Wipro's Chairman Azim Premji.
summary: विप्रो के रिशद प्रेमजी ने 2018-19 के लिए नैसकॉम अध्यक्ष नियुक्त किया

text: The combined net worth of Russia's 27 wealthiest people plunged by $16 billion on Monday. This comes after the US imposed sanctions against 24 Russian oligarchs and officials, including President Vladimir Putin's former son-in-law Kirill Shamalov. The world's second largest nickel producer Norilsk Nickel's CEO Vladimir Potanin lead the decline as his fortune fell by $2.25 billion.
summary: रूस के सबसे अमीर लोग एक दिन में $ 16 बिलियन खो देते हैं

text: Actor Rajkummar Rao revealed that his loved ones wanted him to add an extra 'M' in his name, while adding, "But, it's not like just because of that suddenly things changed for me." The actor said that his name was actually Rajkumar Yadav. He further said, "I think eventually it's your hard work and commitment which pays off."
summary: नाम में अतिरिक्त 'एम' ने मेरे लिए चीजें नहीं बदलीं: राजकुमार राव

text: As per reports, actor Sidharth Malhotra will be seen playing the role of a thug in Ekta Kapoor's upcoming film 'Shotgun Shaadi'. The film, which reportedly also stars Shraddha Kapoor, is based on groom-kidnapping practice which is said to be prevalent in North India. Sidharth is said to have started taking classes to master the Bihari diction.
summary: सिद्धार्थ मल्होत्रा 'शॉटगन शादी' में एक ठग की भूमिका निभाने के लिए: रिपोर्ट

text: Indian shooter Heena Sidhu, who set a CWG record to win gold in women's 25m Pistol on Tuesday, has said that her score of 38 was "good enough" for any Olympic final. This was Sidhu's first major gold in 25m Pistol and second medal at the Gold Coast Games, after having won silver in women's 10m Air Pistol.
summary: मेरा स्कोर किसी भी ओलंपिक फाइनल के लिए काफी अच्छा था: हीना सिद्धू

text: Manika Batra, who was a part of women's table tennis team which won gold at the CWG 2018, will be awarded Ã¢ÂÂ¹14 lakh by Delhi government. Delhi-born Batra helped India become only the second nation after Singapore to win CWG gold in the women's table tennisÃÂ team event. The 22-year-old won both her singles' matches in the final against Singapore.
summary: दिल्ली सरकार ने CWG की स्वर्ण पदक विजेता मनिका को G lakh14 लाख का पुरस्कार दिया

text: Former England captain Andrew Flintoff has said that it is "nonsense" that only three Australian cricketers knew about the ball-tampering plan. "The ball is so important...you talk about how you're going to treat it...To say a bowler has got a ball in his hands (and he) doesn't know that this ball has been tampered with is absolute nonsense," he added.
summary: बॉल टैंपरिंग के बारे में बकवास केवल तीन जानते थे: फ्लिंटॉफ

text: A 33-year-old woman has criticised American Airlines after a ceiling panel allegedly fell onto her son's head as the flight touched down in Texas, US. The woman claimed that her one-year-old son was on her lap when the panel, which included a tank of oxygen, fell down. Meanwhile, the airline said the woman declined medical help at the gate.
summary: उड़ान के दौरान एक वर्षीय लड़के के सिर पर छत का पैनल गिरता है

text: Slamming Karnataka minister UT Khader for consuming beef, RSS leader Kalladka Prabhakar has said that the temples visited by him must be cleaned using holy water. He added that Khader should be prohibited from entering all temples. While the Congress filed an FIR against Prabhakar, Khader said he has forgiven him for his remarks as he follows Islamic teachings.
summary: K'taka मंत्री द्वारा दौरा मंदिरों को शुद्ध करना चाहिए: RSS नेता

text: Upset over instances of caste violence in the nation, a 45-year-old RSS worker set himself on fire in Jaipur and died a day later. The man, who reportedly ran on streets shouting 'Bharat Mata ki jai' after setting himself ablaze, urged the youth to stand united in a suicide note. He was reportedly distressed over violence during Bharat Bandh protests.
summary: जातिगत हिंसा पर आग लगाने के बाद RSS का आदमी मर जाता है

text: Goa CM Manohar Parrikar is likely to return from the US in May after receiving treatment for a pancreas-related ailment, state BJP General Secretary Sadanand Tanavade said. The former Defence Minister is responding well to the treatment, he added. Parrikar, who went to the US last month, was earlier admitted to hospitals in Goa and Mumbai.
summary: मई में इलाज के बाद अमेरिका से लौटने वाले गोवा सीएम: भाजपा नेता

text: The Enforcement Directorate has attached immovable properties worth Ã¢ÂÂ¹15 crore of Chennai-based businessman S Rajendran in a case of illegal remittance of about Ã¢ÂÂ¹128 crore abroad. Rajendran and two others allegedly remitted the forex through Star Forex India. The accused reportedly obtained a 'Full Fledged Money Changer' license under Star Forex India from the RBI by submitting bogus documents.
summary: ED ने चेन्नई के कारोबारी की assets Â‚Â¹ -15-cr मूल्य की संपत्ति संलग्न की

text: PM Narendra Modi and BJP President Amit Shah, along with all BJP MPs, will observe a day-long fast on April 12 in protest against disruptions during the recently-concluded Budget session of the Parliament. The Lok Sabha lost nearly 128 hours due to disruptions and adjournments during the session. Only five bills were passed and another five introduced in the House.
summary: संसद में हंगामे के विरोध में उपवास करते पीएम मोदी

text: Luis Fonsi's 'Despacito', which was YouTube's most watched video, appears to have been deleted from YouTube in an apparent hack. 'Despacito' had recently become the first YouTube video in history to reach 5 billion views. The hackers reportedly also targeted several videos, including Selena Gomez's 'Wolves', where the title of the videos were renamed to 'Hacked by Prosox'.
summary: YouTube का सबसे ज्यादा देखा जाने वाला वीडियो 'डेस्पासितो' हैकर्स ने डिलीट कर दिया

text: India's Muhammed Anas Yahiya ran the men's 400m race at CWG 2018 in 45.31 seconds to finish fourth and break his own national record on Tuesday. Yahiya, only the second Indian after Milkha Singh to reach the men's 400m final at CWG, had clocked 45.32 seconds to set the previous record. The 23-year-old missed a medal by just 0.2 seconds.
summary: भारत का दूसरा 400 मीटर सीडब्ल्यूजी फाइनल अपने ही राष्ट्रीय रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ देता है

text: Mumbai Police arrested a fashion designer for allegedly raping his daughters, aged 13 and 17, for two years. He has been sent to police custody till April 13. His 17-year-old daughter reportedly confided in her mother after he threatened to not pay for her education and 'throw her out of the house' if she didn't give in to his demands.
summary: फैशन डिजाइनर ने 2 साल की किशोरी बेटियों के साथ बलात्कार करने के आरोप में गिरफ्तार किया

text: Rajasthan Royals pacer Ben Laughlin bowled seven legal deliveries in an over during the side's match against Sunrisers Hyderabad in 2018 IPL on Monday. The incident, which went unnoticed during the 12th over of the match, did not seem to have much impact on the match's result as Sunrisers won by 9 wickets with 25 balls remaining.
summary: राजस्थान रॉयल्स के गेंदबाज ने 1 ओवर में 7 कानूनी गेंद फेंकी

text: A sperm whale found dead on Spain's southern coast was killed due to swallowing 29 kilos of ocean plastic waste, government officials have confirmed. Investigators uncovered plastic bags, net pieces, and a jerrycan in the whale's digestive system during the autopsy. The whale, which was around 10 metres long and weighed more than six tonnes, was found ashore in February.
summary: व्हेल के पेट में 29 किलो प्लास्टिक के साथ स्पेन में मृत पाया गया

text: Speaking on the 100th anniversary of the Champaran Satyagraha, PM Narendra Modi said Bihar had transformed Mahatma Gandhi into 'Bapu'. Bihar residents have shown leadership skills in the journey from 'satyagraha' to 'swachhagraha', he added. Stating that the state reflected maximum improvement under Swachh Bharat Mission, PM Modi said 8.5 lakh toilets have been constructed in Bihar in a week.
summary: बिहार ने महात्मा गांधी को 'बापू' में बदल दिया: पीएम मोदी

text: The Supreme Court has directed a Special Task Force appointed to deal with unauthorised constructions in Delhi to demolish any building that poses a safety risk, even if it was built legally. It stated aspects including fire safety, citizens' health, and children's lives must be considered while taking such decisions. It was hearing petitions against illegal constructions in the city.
summary: सुरक्षा जोखिमों को भड़काती कानूनी इमारतें: दिल्ली निकाय को एस.सी.

text: Amid the rising trade tensions between China and the US, Chinese President Xi Jinping on Tuesday promised to "significantly lower" tariffs on vehicle imports. The statement comes after US President Donald Trump complained about China's 25% tariff on foreign cars, pointing out that it is far higher than the 2.5% imposed by the US.
summary: अमेरिकी व्यापार टकराव के बीच चीनी प्रेज़ ने ऑटो टैरिफ में कटौती करने का वादा किया

text: A zoo in New Zealand's Wellington has revealed that a failed attempt to steal squirrel monkeys from one of its enclosures was made on Friday night. The attempt was foiled as the monkeys fought the thieves. The zoo said that some of the monkeys suffered minor injuries, while the thieves would have "some monkey bites".
summary: बंदर चोरों से लड़ते हैं जिन्होंने NZ में चिड़ियाघर से उन्हें चोरी करने की कोशिश की

text: Canadian police are searching for a woman suspected of stealing a rock worth $17,500 (Ã¢ÂÂ¹11 lakh) from a museum exhibit. 'Love Yourself' was written on the rock by artist Yoko Ono, the widow of singer-songwriter John Lennon. Social media users tweeted, "Keep the rock, lady. Enjoy it," and "IÃ¢ÂÂm having a hard time believing that ugly rock is worth 17,000$."
summary: कनाडाई पुलिस ने उस महिला की तलाश की जिसने worth .11 लाख की कीमत की चट्टान चुराई थी

text: Former PNB Deputy Manager Gokulnath Shetty has reportedly said that Nirav Modi and Mehul Choksi blackmailed him for issuing Letters of Undertaking (LoUs). He confessed to issuing the first LoU to Nirav without any securities and collaterals in 2010. Shetty alleged that they threatened to expose his first misconduct to PNB management, which forced him to keep issuing fraudulent LoUs.
summary: नीरव, चोकसी ने मुझे LoU जारी करने के लिए ब्लैकमेल किया: Ex-PNB DM

text: ITC has agreed to remove all references to rival PepsiCo's Tropicana from an advertisement campaign with the hashtag "SayNoToConcentrate" for its juice brand B Natural. The Delhi High Court had directed ITC to discontinue the campaign after a complaint by PepsiCo. However, ITC was allowed to hold a promotional event in Mumbai, without being disparaging about PepsiCo or its brands.
summary: ITC जूस का विज्ञापन कहता है, ट्रॉपिकाना का संदर्भ देता है

text: Tiger Shroff, while responding to Subhash Ghai's tweet comparing him to his father Jackie Shroff, wrote, "There can only be one hero and that's dad!" Ghai had written, "A Great tribute to...Jackie Shroff is his own bright son Tiger Shroff as #Hero Vs Hero." While Jackie starred in the 1983 film 'Hero', Tiger made his debut in 2014 with 'Heropanti'.
summary: केवल एक ही हीरो हो सकता है और वह है मेरे डैड: टाइगर

text: As per reports, Sonam Kapoor will be marrying businessman Anand Ahuja in Mumbai on April 29. Earlier there were reports of them getting married in Montreux, Switzerland in May. Sonam's family reportedly could not host the wedding at their choice of resort in Montreux as it was pre-booked by a Saudi princess for those dates.
summary: 29 अप्रैल को मुंबई में आनंद आहूजा से शादी करने वाली सोनम: रिपोर्ट

text: Richa Chadha, while slamming the Uttar Pradesh government's decision to withdraw a seven-year-old rape and abduction lawsuit against former Union Minister Swami Chinmayanand, tweeted, "Dear government, please change #BetiBachao to #BetiHumHiSeBachao." In her tweet, Richa also made a reference to the Unnao rape case in which a BJP MLA was accused of raping a minor a year ago.
summary: बेटी बचाओ बेटी पढ़ाओ में बदलो हमको बच्चा: ऋचा को सरकार

text: As many as 4,000 police personnel have been deployed around the Chepauk Stadium ahead of CSK's first IPL match in Chennai after around three years amid Cauvery protests. Tamil groups have threatened that they could carry out protests inside the stadium. Earlier, TVK leader Velmurugan threatened his party would let loose snakes inside the stadium if the match goes through.
summary: सीएसके के मैच से पहले चेपॉक के आसपास 4,000 पुलिसकर्मी तैनात थे

text: TVK leader Velmurugan has threatened his party would let loose snakes inside the Chepauk Stadium in Chennai if CSK's first home match against KKR goes through on Tuesday. This comes amid protests by state parties urging the Centre to constitute the Cauvery Management Board. Earlier, Velmurugan had said the protestors wouldn't be responsible for any "untoward incident" at the stadium.
summary: CSK मैच के दौरान स्टेडियम में ढीले सांपों को देंगे: TN नेता

text: Para powerlifter Sachin Chaudhary clinched the bronze medal in the men's heavyweight category on Tuesday to take India's medal tally to 21 at the Commonwealth Games 2018. Sachin successfully lifted 201kg after failing twice to finish with 181 points, 10.9 points behind first-placed Nigeria's Abdulazeez Ibrahim. Sachin had won silver at the 2017 Powerlifting World Cup in Dubai.
summary: सचिन ने कांस्य जीता, CWG में भारत का पदक 21 तक ले गया

text: American golfer Tiger Woods missed scoring a hole-in-one as the ball rolled over the hole at the recently concluded Augusta National Masters in the US. Woods missed being only the second golfer to achieve the feat at the par-3 fourth hole at the Augusta Masters. The 232-yard shot, taken using a 4-iron, took two hops before skipping the hole.
summary: टाइगर वुड्स छेद में गेंद रोल के रूप में छेद में एक याद आती है

text: Belgium defender Davina Philtjens conceded a penalty against Portugal by holding the ball with hands inches away from goal in injury time during a FIFA Women's World Cup qualifier. Portugal winger Jessica Silva nutmegged her opponent before crossing the ball into the box where Philtjens slipped and held the ball. Philtjens was sent off as Portugal equalised with the penalty.
summary: खिलाड़ी ने गोल के पास हाथों से बॉल पकड़कर पेनल्टी लगाई

text: Nearly 300 flights were cancelled on Monday and several others rescheduled after the main runway at the Mumbai airport was closed for six hours for pre-monsoon maintenance work. The Mumbai airport has two intersecting runways, namely the main runway and the secondary runway. On an average, there are 970 flight arrivals and departures at the Mumbai airport every day.
summary: रनवे बंद होने के बाद मुंबई एयरपोर्ट पर 300 उड़ानें रद्द

text: Mumbai-based meal box startup Yumlane has raised $4 million in Series A funding round led by Singapore-based RB Investments. Flipkart Co-founder Binny Bansal and Orios Venture Partners also participated in the funding round. Founded in 2016, Yumlane sells freshly packed food from cuisines including Italian and Chinese and is also present in Bengaluru and Pune.
summary: फ्लिपकार्ट के सह-संस्थापक समर्थित भोजन बॉक्स स्टार्टअप में $ 4 मिलियन की वृद्धि हुई है

text: Researchers have developed a simple blood test to estimate the risk of developing active tuberculosis. The test measures the activity of pairs of genes involved in the inflammatory response. Researchers analysed the health status of around 4,500 African people living with a tuberculosis patient. The international team hopes to commercially develop the test to avoid treating people at low risk.
summary: क्षय रोग के जोखिम की भविष्यवाणी करने के लिए नया रक्त परीक्षण

text: A Tanzania-based study found that rats can sniff out tuberculosis 68% better than the standard swab test, approved by the US health agency FDA. The researchers trained the rats with odour of tuberculosis-infected mucous, who then identified 57 additional cases of TB among 982 children. On confirming the results by a WHO researcher, the additional patients were treated as well.
summary: एफडीए द्वारा अनुमोदित परीक्षण की तुलना में टीबी को पहचानने में चूहे 68% बेहतर हैं: अध्ययन

text: At least 56 cows died on Monday after allegedly feeding on pesticides dumped at a field in Andhra Pradesh's Daida village. The autopsy reports revealed that there was cyanide content in the cows' internal organs. "The poison (cyanide) takes just 15 to 20 minutes to work. It reduces the oxygen-carrying capacity of the animal," a doctor said.
summary: आंध्र के गाँव में कीटनाशकों पर भोजन करने के बाद 56 गायों की मौत हो जाती है

text: The number of UK nationals seeking citizenship in another EU member state more than doubled in 2016, according to a European statistical agency. In the Brexit year, 6,555 Britons acquired citizenship in another of the bloc's nations, up 165% from 2,478 in 2015. Around 13 lakh people born in the UK live in other EU countries, according to UN estimates.
summary: यूरोपीय संघ की नागरिकता पाने वाले ब्रिटेन के लोग ब्रेक्सिट वर्ष में दोगुने हो गए

text: Daughter of former Russian spy Sergei Skripal, Yulia, has been discharged from a UK hospital more than a month after being poisoned with a nerve agent along with her father. She has been taken to a secure location following her discharge. The UK had accused Russia for the attack which took place in Salisbury, UK.
summary: पूर्व जासूस की बेटी को जहर देने के बाद अस्पताल से छुट्टी मिल गई

text: Chinese luxury hotel 'Cordis' claims the air inside its premises passes through two levels of filtration and is continuously cleaned, while the double-glazed windows remain closed at all times. Further, information about the air quality and PM2.5 levels is displayed on TV screens in the guest rooms. The hotel also has a glass-sided swimming pool, a spa and twin ballrooms.
summary: चीनी होटल 'फ़िल्टर की गई हवा' प्रदान करता है, PM2.5 स्तरों पर जानकारी

text: American comedian-actor Bill Cosby on Monday faced a topless protester at his retrial for alleged sexual assault. A former Cosby Show actress, Nicolle Rochelle, confronted him with 'WomenÃ¢ÂÂs Lives Matter' and other phrases written on her body. The retrial is on the accusations by Andrea Constand, a former basketball player, that Cosby had drugged and sexually assaulted her in 2004.
summary: बिल कॉस्बी ने यौन उत्पीड़न रेट्रियल में टॉपलेस प्रोटेक्टर का सामना किया

text: Salman Khan's 'Hum Saath-Saath Hain' co-star Kunickaa Sadanand has filed a police complaint against the Bishnoi community, alleging that she received death threats for supporting Salman in the 1998 blackbuck poaching case. "I was advocating that instead of punishing Salman...he should be made to do some work for the community...I said even Bishnois are hunters," said Kunickaa.
summary: सलमान के को-स्टार ने बिश्नोईयों के खिलाफ दर्ज की मौत की धमकी

text: Muhammed Anas Yahiya has become the first Indian to qualify for the men's 400m final at the Commonwealth Games since Milkha Singh. Anas was the joint-third fastest runner to qualify for Tuesday's final with a timing of 45.44 seconds. Milkha had won gold in the 400m race (then called 440-yard race) at the British Empire and Commonwealth Games in 1958.
summary: अनस 1 भारतीय मिल्खा सिंह के बाद से CWG 400 मीटर के फाइनल में प्रवेश करने वाले हैं

text: Indian cricketer Mohammad Shami's wife Hasin Jahan has filed a domestic violence case against the pacer and four other family members in Alipore Court. The 27-year-old cricketer's estranged wife had earlier filed a complaint against him over allegations of domestic violence and adultery. Notably, Shami had taken to Instagram two days back to wish his wife on their marriage anniversary.
summary: शमी की पत्नी ने उनके खिलाफ 4 अन्य के खिलाफ घरेलू शोषण का मामला दर्ज किया है

text: Facebook-owned messaging service WhatsApp is looking to hire 'Head of India', reportedly its first full time hire in the country. The executive will directly report to its COO Matthew Idema and represent its product strategy in India. The position requires a person to be a "heavy user of WhatsApps products" and have 15 years of experience in Product driven companies.
summary: व्हाट्सएप ने पहली बार 'हेड ऑफ इंडिया' को नियुक्त किया

text: About 63,714 people in New Zealand may have been impacted by the Facebook data leak after only 10 users downloaded the personality quiz app which caused the data scandal, the social media giant has revealed. New Zealand's privacy commissioner said he was seeking further information but added that no reports of its impact on 2017 elections have surfaced to date.
summary: 10 उपयोगकर्ताओं द्वारा ऐप डाउनलोड करने के बाद FB लीक ने 63,700 NZ लोगों को मारा

text: Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister KE Krishna Murthy on Monday said that Telugu speakers in Karnataka and Tamil Nadu should "vote for anybody but BJP" because PM Narendra Modi denied special status to Andhra Pradesh. Speaking at a press conference in Bengaluru, Murthy also accused PM Narendra Modi of 'cheating' the Telugu people.
summary: किसी को भी वोट दें लेकिन बीजेपी: आंध्र प्रदेश के सीएम से लेकर मतदाता तेलुगु मतदाता तक

text: An MIT study has suggested large concentrations of sulphites and bisulphites in shallow lakes may have set the stage for Earth's first biological molecules. Researchers said the sulphur-based anions released by volcanoes around 3.9 billion years ago would have sped up the chemical reactions required to convert very simple prebiotic molecules into RNA, a genetic building block of life.
summary: झीलों में सल्फाइट्स ने पृथ्वी पर जीवन शुरू करने में मदद की: अध्ययन

text: NASA's Hubble space telescope recently captured a circle of light, called the "Einstein ring", which occurs when light coming from a background galaxy is distorted around a massive cluster making it seem that the galaxy is in multiple places at once. The phenomena of galaxies bending starlight by their strong gravitational force was predicted by Albert Einstein in 1915.
summary: नासा दूरबीन द्वारा कैप्चर की गई 'आइंस्टीन रिंग' क्या है?

text: The Supreme Court on Monday asked the Centre and the Delhi government to not make the sealing of illegal structures in the national capital a political issue. Further, asserting that the residents' health was more important than profits, the court asked authorities to proceed holistically and look into fire safety and depletion of groundwater while dealing with unauthorised constructions.
summary: दिल्ली में अवैध संरचनाओं की सीलिंग का राजनीतिकरण न करें: SC

text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday congratulated 'Swachhagrahis' for building 8.5 lakh toilets in Bihar in the last one week. Speaking during the anniversary celebrations of Mahatma Gandhi's Satyagraha in Champaran, PM Narendra Modi added, "With the construction of toilet, women are getting respect, safety and health."
summary: 'स्वच्छाग्रहियों' ने एक सप्ताह में बिहार में बनाया 8 लाख शौचालय: पीएम

text: Bombay High Court has observed that there must be instructions for police as to what they should do if they rescue pregnant minors. The court was hearing a 14-year-old rape survivor's plea seeking to terminate her 24-week-long pregnancy. The court's observation came after it was revealed that police found out about the girl's pregnancy in March but didn't inform anyone.
summary: रेस्क्यू किए गए गर्भवती नाबालिगों को संभालने के लिए पुलिस को दिशा-निर्देशों की जरूरत है: एच.सी.

text: At least two Indian Army jawans were martyred in ceasefire violation by Pakistan army in Jammu and Kashmir's Sunderbani sector along the Line of Control on Monday. "Pakistan Army initiated unprovoked and indiscriminate firing of small arms, automatics and mortars from 1715 hours," a defence spokesman said. Both the jawans hailed from Jammu and Kashmir.
summary: LoC पर पाक द्वारा किए गए संघर्ष विराम उल्लंघन में 2 जवान शहीद

text: US Ambassador Nikki Haley slammed Russia on Monday in a United Nations Security Council meeting on the alleged Syria chemical attack, saying its hands are "covered in the blood of Syrian children". Urging the UNSC to act, Haley added that "the world must see justice done". This comes after Trump vowed to respond to Syria gas attack within 48 hours.
summary: सीरिया के बच्चों के खून में रूस के हाथ: अमेरिका

text: After the FBI raided the office of Donald Trump's lawyer Michael Cohen, the US President condemned the raid as "disgraceful". Defending Cohen as a "good man", Trump said FBI agents "broke into" the lawyer's office. The FBI seized documents on various issues including a payment to pornstar Stormy Daniels for her silence over an alleged sexual affair with Trump.
summary: ट्रम्प ने अपने वकील के कार्यालय पर 'अपमानजनक' एफबीआई छापा मारा

text: Pakistan has launched a nationwide polio eradication drive amid threats from Taliban, which has undermined the efforts to eradicate the disease. The militant group killed 15 people outside a polio vaccination centre in 2016 and a mother-daughter vaccination team in January this year. Notably, Pakistan is one of only three countries in the world that suffers from endemic polio.
summary: तालिबान के खतरे के बीच पाकिस्तान ने पोलियो उन्मूलन अभियान शुरू किया

text: The skeletons of two dinosaurs will be auctioned in Paris this week. The smaller skeleton is 3.8 metres long and is expected to fetch up to Ã¢ÂÂ¬650,000 (Ã¢ÂÂ¹5.2 crore), while the larger one is 12 metres long and has a guide price of up to Ã¢ÂÂ¬500,000 (Ã¢ÂÂ¹4 crore). "Dinosaurs have become cool, trendy, real objects of decoration," said an expert.
summary: पेरिस में नीलाम किए जाने वाले डायनासोर के कंकाल

text: Civil Aviation Secretary RN Choubey has said the government will still want to see if IndiGo bids for Air India. This comes after IndiGo announced its decision not to bid for the carrier as its primary interest in acquiring Air India's international operations wasn't available under the disinvestment plan. Choubey added Air India's operations wouldn't be split in bidding process.
summary: फिर भी इंतजार है कि क्या इंडिगो एयर इंडिया के लिए बोली लगाएगी: सरकार

text: Jet Airways has opted out of Air India bid less than two weeks after the government asked bidders to send expressions of interest. The carrier's Deputy CEO Amit Agarwal said the decision was taken considering the offer's terms. Notably, the announcement comes days after IndiGo said it did not want to buy Air India's domestic and international networks together.
summary: जेट एयरवेज ने एयर इंडिया के लिए बोली लगाई

text: English cyclist Melissa Lowther was denied participation in the Commonwealth Games' women's individual time trial on Tuesday as the English contingent's officials forgot to tick a box on her entry form. "While Team England have apologised, I'm still gutted not to have the opportunity to represent my country after all the hard miles I have put in", Melissa later said.
summary: साइक्लिस्ट ने सीडब्ल्यूजी रेस में प्रवेश से इनकार कर दिया क्योंकि टीम बॉक्स पर टिक करना भूल गई

text: Australian motorcycle racer Jack Miller started the Argentina MotoGP qualifying 50 metres ahead of his rivals. Miller opted for slick tyres on a track which was drying after rain while his rivals had wet weather tyres. The rivals were punished and asked to start the race three rows behind Miller for changing to slick tyres so late.
summary: प्रतिद्वंद्वियों को सजा मिलने के बाद रेसर 50 मीटर आगे दौड़ शुरू करते हैं

text: Technology giant Google has appealed against Indian competition watchdog's judgement that found the company guilty of 'search bias', according to reports. In February, the watchdog imposed a fine of Ã¢ÂÂ¹135.86 crore on Google over the same issue. Google was abusing its dominance in online web search and online search advertising markets, the watchdog had earlier said.
summary: Google ने भारत के 'खोज पूर्वाग्रह' फैसले के खिलाफ अपील की: रिपोर्ट

text: A video shows passengers swatting mosquitoes on a Jet Airways flight at the Lucknow airport. The video, taken on Sunday, shows passengers using newspapers and safety advisory pamphlets to avoid the mosquitoes. Jet Airways took cognisance of the video, and said, "We have taken this up with our cabin appearance team for review. We sincerely regret the inconvenience."
summary: वीडियो: जेट एयरवेज की फ्लाइट में यात्रियों ने मच्छर उड़ाया

text: Lawyers in Madhya Pradesh's Bhopal on Monday shaved their heads in protest, demanding the implementation of the Advocates Protection Act. Advocates across the state started the week-long protest despite the High Court Registrar's statement urging them to call it off. In 2012, the state government said the act would be implemented but it hasn't come into effect yet.
summary: प्रदर्शनकारी वकीलों ने मध्य प्रदेश में अपना सिर मुंडवा लिया

text: A PIL has been filed in the Supreme Court seeking a CBI probe into the rape case against BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar. The petitioner has also sought compensation and protection to the family of the victim. This comes after the rape victim's father on Monday died after being allegedly beaten by the MLA's brother in judicial custody.
summary: भाजपा विधायक के खिलाफ बलात्कार मामले की सीबीआई जांच के लिए SC में दायर की गई जनहित याचिका

text: Instant messaging service WhatsApp's privacy policy mentions that it shares information collected under its Payments Privacy Policy with third-party service providers including Facebook. The data shared includes users' phone numbers, payment amount, and registration information. Notably, WhatsApp is testing its digital payments service via UPI platform in India since February this year.
summary: व्हाट्सएप यूजर्स के पेमेंट की जानकारी फेसबुक के साथ शेयर करता है

text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday flagged off India's first all-electric high-speed locomotive in Bihar. The first big Make-in-India project completed by France's Alstom, the train has the country's most powerful engine with 12,000 horsepower and a maximum speed of 120 km per hour. The average cost of one high-speed locomotive is around Ã¢ÂÂ¹25 crore.
summary: पीएम मोदी ने लॉन्च की भारत की पहली ऑल-इलेक्ट्रिक हाई-स्पीड ट्रेन

text: British data firm Cambridge Analytica, accused of illegally obtaining the personal data of millions of Facebook users, has listed 10 'facts' denying multiple allegations. Claiming that it hasn't broken any laws and didn't "hack" Facebook, the company said it did not use the data to influence the US Presidential Election and added that the claims are "simply untrue".
summary: एफबी डेटा लीक के आरोपी फर्म ने दावों से इनकार करते हुए 10 'तथ्यों' को सूचीबद्ध किया

text: Talking about Facebook's data scandal and #deletefacebook campaign, Alibaba Founder Jack Ma has said, "We should not kill the company because of these problems." Adding that it is time to fix the problems, Ma said it is also "the time for the CEO to really take it seriously." The most important solution is that Facebook respects privacy, Ma added.
summary: हमें चल रही समस्याओं पर फेसबुक को नहीं मारना चाहिए: जैक मा

text: A Bengaluru-based cardiologist was offloaded from an IndiGo flight at Lucknow airport after he complained about mosquitoes. Dr Saurabh Rai claimed he was threatened and called a terrorist, while an air hostess said there were mosquitoes all over India. IndiGo said the passenger was unruly and had tried instigating other passengers to damage the aircraft while using words like 'hijack'.
summary: मच्छरों के बारे में शिकायत करने के बाद इंडिगो डॉक्टर को छोड़ देता है

text: Uttar Pradesh Police announced that a Special Investigation Team has been formed to probe incidents related to a rape case filed against BJP MLA Kuldeep Sengar from Unnao. "Investigation is being done and action will definitely be taken," police said. This comes after the rape victim's father died after allegedly being beaten up in police custody by the MLA's brother.
summary: यूपी पुलिस ने बलात्कार के आरोपी बीजेपी विधायक के खिलाफ SIT जांच की घोषणा की

text: A study led by British Antarctic Survey has revealed a 10% increase in snowfall over the last 200 years. However, when the ice loss is not replenished by snowfall, the sea level rises, said researchers, who analysed 79 ice cores from across Antarctica to reconstruct the frozen continent's climate history.
summary: अंटार्कटिका में बर्फबारी के बावजूद बर्फ का नुकसान: अध्ययन

text: Gujarat Police's Criminal Investigation Department has filed an FIR against nine policemen in the state for allegedly kidnapping and extorting 200 Bitcoins worth over Ã¢ÂÂ¹12 crore from a Surat-based builder. "[They] threatened to kill me in a fake encounter if I didn't hand over my Bitcoins," the builder said. Meanwhile, three cops have been arrested while an inspector is absconding.
summary: गुजरात पुलिस ने बिल्डर का अपहरण कर लिया, बिटकॉइन की कीमत लगभग। Ap12 करोड़ कर दी

text: A saffron coloured statue of BR Ambedkar in Uttar Pradesh's Budaun was repainted blue by BSP leader Himendra Gautam. The Uttar Pradesh government had installed the saffron statue a few days ago to replace one which was vandalised some time back. "Everyone knows Ambedkar wore a blue suit," BSP leader Sudhindra Bhadoria had said.
summary: भगवा अंबेडकर की प्रतिमा को बसपा नेता ने नीला कर दिया

text: A madrasa in Uttar Pradesh's Gorakhpur is teaching students Sanskrit in addition to languages like Hindi, English, Arabic and Urdu. The principal of the madrasa said, "Sanskrit is now being taught to all students above Class 5. The parents of the students are also very happy and have never raised any objection to this".
summary: उत्तर प्रदेश मदरसा अन्य विषयों के बीच संस्कृत पढ़ाता है

text: The Uttar Pradesh government has decided to withdraw a seven-year-old rape case against BJP leader and former Union Minister Swami Chinmayanand. Chinmayanand had been booked for allegedly abducting and raping a woman in an ashram, and threatening her against complaining. However, no reason has been provided by the state government for withdrawing the complaint.
summary: बीजेपी नेता के खिलाफ बलात्कार का मुकदमा वापस लेने वाली यूपी सरकार

text: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) on Monday raided US President Donald Trump's personal lawyer Michael Cohen's offices. The authorities seized documents on various issues including the payment of $130,000 by Cohen to pornstar Stormy Daniels for her silence over her alleged love affair with Trump. Slamming the move as a "disgraceful situation", Trump called it "new level of unfairness".
summary: FBI ने ट्रम्प वकील के कार्यालयों पर छापा मारा, स्टॉर्मी डेनियल्स डॉक्स को जब्त किया

text: China's President Xi Jinping has warned against a 'Cold War mentality' and vowed to open up parts of the country's economy amid rising tensions with the US. "The trend of peace is moving forward and a Cold War mentality is outdated," Xi said. This comes a day after US President Donald Trump spoke against Chinese tariffs on car imports.
summary: शीत युद्ध की मानसिकता में लौटने के खिलाफ चीन ने दी चेतावनी

text: A competitive eater who participated in a chilli eating contest had to be taken to the hospital after he developed a pain in his neck that turned into a series of thunderclap headaches, it emerged recently. He had eaten a Carolina Reaper pepper, which was the hottest chilli pepper in the world when the incident occurred in 2016.
summary: आदमी दुनिया की सबसे तीखी मिर्च खाता है, अस्पताल में समाप्त होता है

text: PNB's Managing Director Sunil Mehta has said the bank won't seek government's assistance to tackle the Nirav Modi fraud. "We said this is problem of the bank and we will solve it (ourselves)," he said, adding that the bank has enough resources and capability to do so. PNB has mobilised roughly Ã¢ÂÂ¹12,000 crore after September 2017, Mehta further said.
summary: नीरव मोदी धोखाधड़ी PNB का मुद्दा है, सरकार का समर्थन नहीं चाहिए: MD

text: Rajiev Dhingra, the director of Kapil Sharma starrer 'Firangi' has said that Kapil's ex-girlfriend Preeti Simoes is responsible for driving him into depression. "As soon as she learnt that he was marrying his girlfriend Ginni (Chatrath), she vowed to destroy him," he added. Rajiev further said, "She threatened me saying...she will get [Kapil and me] thrown out of the industry."
summary: कपिल की पूर्व प्रीति ने उन्हें अवसाद में डाल दिया: फिरंगी निर्माता

text: Ranveer Singh will be honoured with the Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence Award in the Best Actor category for his work in 'Padmaavat'. The awards, which were established by the Dadasaheb Phalke Film Foundation, recognise contributions to Indian cinema. Apart from Ranveer, Anushka Sharma will also be awarded the Dadasaheb Phalke Excellence Award for her contribution to films as a producer.
summary: दादासाहेब फाल्के एक्सीलेंस अवार्ड पाने के लिए रणवीर सिंह

text: 'The Kapil Sharma Show' actress Upasana Singh, while speaking about the row between Kapil and editor Vickey Lalwani, said, "He drinks but that isn't an excuse for such behaviour." "Kapil has been mentally disturbed...In such a condition people make mistakes," she added. Upasana further said she is "shocked" by Kapil's language in the audio tape of his conversation with Lalwani.
summary: शराब पीना कपिल के व्यवहार का बहाना नहीं है: उपासना

text: Former boxing world champion Floyd Mayweather's bodyguard was reportedly shot in the leg outside an Atlanta hotel where the boxing champ was staying. The attack, which was conducted by a gunman riding inside a white SUV, is believed to have been directed towards Mayweather. The police said that the bodyguard was undergoing treatment and was in a stable condition.
summary: फ्लोयड मेवेदर के बॉडीगार्ड ने अटलांटा होटल के बाहर गोली मार दी

text: Ahead of his testimony regarding the recent data scandal at Facebook, the company's CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that he would not consider resigning from his position. "I'm very confident that we're gonna be able to work through these issues," Zuckerberg said. Earlier, Zuckerberg had said that he is still the best person to lead Facebook.
summary: फेसबुक के सीईओ मार्क जुकरबर्ग का कहना है कि वह इस्तीफा नहीं दे रहे हैं

text: Uber on Monday announced it has acquired US-based dockless bike-sharing startup Jump Bikes for a reported amount of $200 million. As a part of the deal, Jump's team will join the cab-hailing company, however, the startup will carry on as an independent subsidiary. Founded in 2010, Jump Bikes allows users to hire bikes for $2 per 30 minutes.
summary: Uber बाइक शेयरिंग स्टार्टअप जंप बाइक्स को $ 200 मिलियन में खरीदता है

text: In a first, scientists at US-based Fermilab were able to identify the exact energy of muon neutrinos hitting the atoms at the heart of their particle detector. Such particle interactions reveal information about the subatomic forces that bind the nucleus together. However, neutrino interactions are difficult to detect since they have no electric charge.
summary: न्यूट्रिनो-परमाणु टक्कर की सटीक ऊर्जा पहली बार मिली

text: Scientists have identified a 'Dark Zone' in the Greenland ice sheet's western part, which is melting up to five times faster than surrounding ice due to contamination with algae, dust and soot from wildfires. The zone measures 400 km in length and spans 100 km at its widest part. Researchers fear the zone is contributing to global sea level rise.
summary: ग्रीनलैंड में तेजी से पिघलने वाला 'डार्क जोन' क्या है?

text: Passengers at Amritsar airport will continue to have their hand baggage tags stamped due to the sensitive security status of the airport, a CISF official has said. The decision was taken considering the airport's proximity to the Pakistan border and the two hijacking incidents in 1999 and 1982. The practice of stamping hand baggage has been stopped at 31 airports.
summary: अमृतसर एयरपोर्ट पर जारी रखने के लिए हैंड बैगेज की स्टैम्पिंग

text: Calling infiltration from borders a major source of terrorism, the Centre told the Supreme Court that the court cannot issue an order directing the government to ensure entry of foreigners in India. It further said that national security is an executive function. The court was hearing a plea against the Centre's decision to deport Rohingya Muslims to Myanmar.

text: Private junior colleges in Telangana have been told by the Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education that strict action would be taken against them for holding classes during summer vacations. Classes should be held only for students appearing for competitive exams or to clear their doubts, officials said. Last week, 12 junior colleges were sent notices for conducting extra classes.
summary: T'gana जूनियर कॉलेजों ने छुट्टियों में कक्षाएं आयोजित नहीं करने के लिए कहा

text: A nursery student was allegedly beaten up by a teacher over delay in payment of school fees in Telangana's Ranga Reddy district. The school administration reportedly hasn't issued any statement regarding the incident. The incident comes months after a teacher at another school in the state was caught on camera thrashing students over alleged non-payment of fee.
summary: फीस देने में देरी को लेकर नर्सरी के छात्र ने शिक्षक की पिटाई कर दी

text: Indian shooter Heena Sidhu set Commonwealth Games record to win gold in women's 25m pistol shooting event on Tuesday. This was Sidhu's second medal at CWG 2018, after winning silver in women's 10m air pistol. Another Indian shooter Annu Singh came sixth in the same event. With this result, India have won three golds and overall eight medals in shooting.
summary: हीना सिद्धू ने महिलाओं की 25 मीटर पिस्टल में गोल्ड जीतने के लिए CWG रिकॉर्ड बनाया

text: TVK leader Velmurugan warned Chennai Super Kings ahead of their IPL match, saying, "If there's even a small untoward incident...those protesting for Cauvery rights are in no way related." Earlier, Velmurugan threatened that if IPL is conducted in Tamil Nadu, people will protest inside the stadium. State parties are protesting against the Centre's delay in setting up Cauvery Management Board.

A meeting was reportedly held in January 2017 with chief vigilance officers of 10 banks, including PNB to discuss such irregularities. summary: सीवीसी ने पीएनबी घोटाले से एक साल पहले आभूषण क्षेत्र के बारे में चेतावनी दी थी

text: Ahead of the Karnataka Assembly elections, state Congress leader Sundara Devinagara quit the party on Saturday morning and rejoined it hours later in the evening. Devinagara had been welcomed into the BJP at a function in the morning. However, he rejoined Congress at another programme held by party leaders at Mani a few hours later.
summary: कांग्रेसी नेता पार्टी छोड़ते हैं, भाजपा में शामिल होते हैं, शाम को कांग्रेस में शामिल होते हैं

text: Addressing reports of him marrying rumoured girlfriend Deepika Padukone by the end of this year, Ranveer Singh said, "If there is any announcement in the future, you will be hearing me shouting from the rooftops." He further said, "Right now we are both extremely busy working. Besides, she is also recuperating from back problems... We are quite occupied and distracted."
summary: तुम मुझे शादी के मामले में छतों से चिल्लाना सुनोगे: रणवीर

text: Arpita Khan Sharma posted a picture of her brother Salman Khan on Instagram with the caption, "God bless all the people that can't handle you or your success." She further called him "God's child" while adding, "I wish only positivity & happiness for you may all the jealousy...fade away." Notably, Salman recently got bail in the blackbuck poaching case.
summary: भगवान ऐसे लोगों को आशीर्वाद देते हैं, जो सलमान की सफलता को संभाल सकते हैं: अर्पिता

text: A Sikh organisation has set the Guinness World Record for the "most turbans tied in 8 hours" by tying over 9,000 turbans to celebrate annual Turban Day at Times Square, New York. text: Retired undefeated boxer and world champion Floyd Mayweather has said if he ever fights again, it will be for the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). "If we can get together with Dana White and the UFC to make a megafight happen, one fight, it could be against Conor McGregor", Mayweather said about his potential move to the mixed martial arts event.
summary: अगर मैं फिर से लड़ता हूं, तो यह UFC के लिए होगा: फ्लॉयड मेवेदर

text: The Telangana Tourism Department on Monday welcomed four women bikers who successfully completed a nearly 17,000-kilometre-long road trip covering six countries. The women, who embarked on their journey from Hyderabad on February 11 to promote Telangana tourism, covered Myanmar, Thailand, Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam, and Bangladesh. They were also supported by the Indian government in this initiative.

text: Congress President Rahul Gandhi, along with his party, observed a day-long fast between 11 am and 4 pm on Monday for communal harmony in the country. text: Indian Administrative Service (IAS) 2015 topper Tina Dabi married the second rank holder Athar Aamir-ul-Shafi Khan in Jammu and Kashmir on Saturday. The couple had met in 2016 during the felicitation ceremony at the Department of Personnel and Training in Delhi. According to reports, they had faced criticism for their relationship as they came from different religious backgrounds.

text: Chintalnar village in Chhattisgarh's Maoist-affected Sukma district has started getting electricity again after 15 years. The rebels had destroyed the power infrastructure in the village in an attempt to disrupt developmental activities in the area. "Electrification of this area is a major relief for all of us. It will be easier for children to study at night," a villager said.

text: Dalit organisation Ambedkar Mahasabha has decided to felicitate Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath with the 'Dalit Mitra' (Friends of Dalits) award. summary: यूपी सीएम योगी अवॉर्ड देने के लिए दलित संगठन, सदस्य हुए परेशान

text: BJP MP Udit Raj has revealed that he had written a letter regarding some fraudulent activities taking place in ICICI Bank to Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) in 2012. However, around 13,000 fake beneficiaries were discovered in Rajasthan.

text: A government school in Rajasthan's Alwar has been painted to look like a railway station, with classrooms as passenger compartments, principal's office as the engine and the verandah as the platform. text: A total of three infants have died and six others have fallen sick in Jharkhand's Palamu, allegedly after they were administered a vaccination. text: A US bus driver named Tracy Dean has been braiding the hair of an 11-year-old girl every day before school as her mother passed away two years ago. text: Seemingly inspired by the viral 'If you don't love me at my' memes, the Mumbai Police has tweeted an image showing a traffic constable issuing a challan and another showing a constable controlling traffic in the rain. text: A DJ who headbutted former Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott was sentenced to a maximum six-month jail term today. text: The Enforcement Directorate has traced over Ã¢ÂÂ¹5,000 crore funnelled through as many as 40 shell companies controlled by jewellers Nirav Modi and Mehul Choksi, reports said. text: Ferrari driver Kimi Raikkonen's car ran over his team mechanic's leg during a pit stop at the Bahrain Grand Prix on Monday. Ferrari have been fined Ã¢ÂÂ¬50,000 while the mechanic was taken to a hospital with a double leg fracture.

text: A Kalaimani, a 45-year-old athlete, has been forced to open and run a tea stall in Tamil Nadu's Coimbatore to make a living. text: Delhi-based startup Chakr Innovation which turns pollution into processed ink has raised undisclosed amount from IDFC-Parampara Fund and Globevestor funds. The startup has developed a pollution controlling device called 'Chakr Shield' which fits in the exhaust pipe of a diesel generator and captures over 90% particulate matter. text: Flight operations at the Mumbai airport are likely to be affected for two days as the airport operator on Monday announced the closure of the main runway for six hours today and tomorrow for pre-monsoon maintenance work. It also requested passengers to contact their respective airlines. The Mumbai airport has two intersecting runways, namely the primary and the secondary runway.

text: The ICICI Bank board has reportedly been divided over whether to ask CEO Chanda Kochhar to resign as CBI probes allegations of impropriety over loans given to Videocon Group. text: Cello Pens maker BIC Group has moved the Bombay High Court against former owners for allegedly violating a non-compete agreement. BIC said close relatives of the Rathods started the Unimax stationery brand in 2016.

text: Investigative agencies are reportedly probing companies owned by ICICI Bank CEO Chanda Kochhar's husband Deepak and his brother Rajiv to check tax evasion and money laundering. It's alleged that Videocon Chairman Venugopal Dhoot pumped money into NuPower in exchange for loans from ICICI.

text: nThe Mercedes-Benz GLS Grand Edition's impressive highlights and unparalleled power give it the authority to rule every terrain. text: In a first, the National Investigation Agency (NIA) has put a former Pakistani diplomat, Amir Zubair Siddique, on its wanted list. text: A fresh plea has been filed in the Supreme Court against the viral song featuring actress Priya Prakash Varrier, claiming that the act of winking is forbidden in Islam. text: Belgium's 23-year-old cyclist Michael Goolaerts passed away in a hospital after suffering a cardiac arrest during the Paris-Roubaix race on Sunday. text: Expressing confidence in a united alliance of Congress, BSP and SP in Uttar Pradesh, Congress President Rahul Gandhi said PM Narendra Modi may even lose his parliamentary constituency of Varanasi in 2019 Lok Sabha elections. text: China's artificial intelligence (AI) startup SenseTime has become the world's most valuable AI startup after raising $600 million mainly from Alibaba. text: President Ram Nath Kovind was on Sunday conferred with the highest civilian honour given to a non-citizen by Equatorial Guinea. He was bestowed with the honour by Equatorial Guinea's President Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo as a recognition of his contribution to security, development, and world peace. text: Denying reports that Sheena Bora murder accused Indrani Mukerjea was on life support, doctors at Mumbai's JJ Hospital confirmed that Mukerjea had a medicine overdose. The doctors added that her condition was stable after she was admitted to the hospital in a "delirious" state.

text: US President Donald Trump has called Syrian President Bashar al-Assad an "animal" over a suspected chemical attack that killed at least 70 people in eastern Ghouta. Trump also slammed Russian President Vladimir Putin and Iran for backing Assad. Trump further claimed that if Barack Obama had acted against Assad, the Syrian President would have been history.

text: A UK boarding school said that it will let boys wear skirts. Its headmaster said, "I would hope that any pupil could come to me and say, 'This is who we are, this is how we wish to express ourselves. text: Rajkummar Rao, while talking about how he might direct films, said, "I have often been told by people that there is a director in me and that it will come out one day." text: Reacting to Royal Challengers Bangalore's loss to Kolkata Knight Riders in their IPL 2018 opener, RCB captain Virat Kohli said, "I played too many dot balls and couldn't get any momentum going". text: Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel won his second Grand Prix in as many races, at the Bahrain Grand Prix, while Mercedes' Valtteri Bottas finished second by just 0.699 seconds. text: Cristiano Ronaldo scored for the 10th game in a row as Real Madrid played out a 1-1 draw against city rivals Atletico Madrid in the La Liga on Sunday. text: Facebook has announced that it will notify the 87 million users, including 562,455 in India, whose data might have been shared with British firm Cambridge Analytica. text: Technology giant Apple will unveil a red version of the iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus models this week, according to reports. It is part of the company's partnership with (RED), an advocacy group dedicated to combating HIV/AIDS in Africa. Reports claimed the phones will be available for preorder, but doesn't specify if it will include an iPhone X edition.

text: WhatsApp has released a feature in beta which allows Android users to lock voice recording button while sending long voice clips. To use the feature, users can tap the mic icon at the bottom right of the chat and swipe it upwards to lock it. WhatsApp is reportedly also working on an option to preview the recorded message before sending.

text: The wing of a Jet Airways aircraft hit a parked catering van when the plane was taxiing towards the parking bay at the Delhi airport on Sunday. In another incident, a Jet Airways Delhi-bound flight made an emergency landing in Lucknow as its landing gear was not functioning properly.

text: Switzerland-based aviation advisory firm Swiss Aviation Consulting has shown interest in bidding for debt-ridden national airline Air India, a senior aviation ministry official has been quoted as saying. text: National Conference (NC) President Farooq Abdullah on Saturday said that the Line of Control (LoC) in J&K should be converted into the "Line of Peace and Goodwill". text: US-based startup Edovo which provides tablet-based education for prisoners has raised $9.8 million in Series A. The round saw participation from Impact Engine, Lumina Foundation, Sustain VC, IDP Foundation, Kapor Capital, and Ekistic Ventures. Founded in 2013, the startup provides certificates and entertainment options and also allows prisoners to stay in touch with their friends and family.

text: A Kerala woman got a man arrested for circulating a fake WhatsApp forward claiming she was planning to elope with her male friend, following which her fiance called off the wedding. In the WhatsApp message, the accused used her picture with the friend and put an audio urging her parents be informed. He was arrested with the cyber cell's help.
summary: आदमी ने नकली व्हाट्सएप टेक्स्ट का आयोजन किया जिसने महिला की शादी को समाप्त कर दिया

text: NCP MLA Sangram Jagtap was among the four arrested for the murder of a Shiv Sena leader and a worker in Maharashtra's Ahmednagar on Saturday after the announcement of civic bypolls results. Another NCP MLA and a BJP MLA were also booked in the incident. The deceased leader's family revealed he was threatened for extending support to Shiv Sena candidate.
summary: 1 विधायक गिरफ्तार, 2 अन्य लोगों पर शिवसेना के लोगों की हत्या का मामला दर्ज

text: During a speech at a tax policy discussion in West Virginia last week, US President Donald Trump threw away his prepared remarks and called them "boring". "This was going to be my remarks, they would have taken about two minutes, get the hell away," Trump said while tossing away the paper.
summary: वीडियो: ट्रम्प ने अपने 'उबाऊ' भाषण नोटों को फेंक दिया

text: The Israeli Army called in the Air Force to target a Palestinian man, which it called an "armed terrorist", spotted at the border fence with Gaza. The Army said Israel Defence Forces' (IDF) operations against "terrorists" will not allow "any harm to the security of Israeli civilians". Last month, Israeli security forces killed 16 Palestinians protesting along the Israel-Gaza border.
summary: इजरायल ने वायु सेना को सीमा पर एक फिलिस्तीनी को निशाना बनाने के लिए बुलाया

text: Noida-based micro-delivery startup MrNeeds which used to operate through an app-based subscription service has shut down. The company which was focussed on optimising the supply chain and minimising delivery costs now displays a message on its website, "Our store is closed". The two-year-old startup used to offer delivery service for milk, bread, eggs, groceries and other essentials.
summary: नोएडा स्थित माइक्रो-डिलीवरी स्टार्टअप MrNeeds बंद हो गया

text: After the success of the 'Grand Indian Holiday Sale', leading travel company Thomas Cook has come up with the 'Incredible India Week' from April 3-11. It facilitates people to explore incredible Indian holiday destinations with discounts, tour packages and also the best price challenge. The tour packages include trips to Andaman, Kerala, Himachal, Uttarakhand among other locations.
summary: थॉमस कुक अप्रैल 4-7 से अतुल्य भारत सप्ताह प्रस्तुत करता है

text: Indian shooter Jitu Rai broke the Commonwealth Games record with a score of 235.1 in the men's 10m Air Pistol event to win his career's second Commonwealth Games gold on Monday. In the same event, another Indian shooter Om Mitharval won the bronze medal to take India's medal tally to 15, including eight gold and three silver.
summary: भारतीय निशानेबाज जीतू राय ने अपना दूसरा स्वर्ण जीतने के लिए CWG रिकॉर्ड तोड़ा

text: The film body Movie Artistes Association (MAA) denied membership to actress Sri Reddy, who went topless in Hyderabad to protest against casting couch in the Telugu film industry. MAA President Sivaji Raja said Sri Reddy going nude in public was for cheap publicity. The film body also stated that members would be suspended if they chose to work with her.
summary: अभिनेत्री जिन्होंने टॉपलेस विरोध का मंचन किया, उन्होंने फिल्म बॉडी सदस्यता से इनकार कर दिया

text: The Irrfan Khan and Saba Qamar starrer 'Hindi Medium' earned over Ã¢ÂÂ¹100 crore in just three days of its release in China on April 4. The film earned more on its opening day than Aamir Khan's 'Dangal' and Salman Khan's 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan', when they released in China. Directed by Saket Chaudhary, 'Hindi Medium' released in India on May 19, 2017.
summary: हिंदी मीडियम ने अपनी चीन रिलीज़ के 3 दिनों में Medium crore crore100 करोड़ की कमाई की

text: KKR opener Sunil Narine slammed 50 off 17 balls against RCB in the evening match on Sunday, becoming the first player to score two 50s off 17 or fewer balls in IPL history. In the afternoon match, KXIP's Lokesh Rahul slammed the fastest-ever IPL fifty off 14 balls against DD, breaking the 15-ball record shared by Narine and Yusuf Pathan.
summary: राहुल के रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ने के बाद नरेन ने 17 गेंदों में 50 रन बनाए

text: Weightlifter Pardeep Singh lifted a combined weight of 352 kg in the men's 105 kg category on Monday to bag India's third silver medal and 13th overall medal at the Commonwealth Games 2018. He lifted 152 kg in snatch and 352 kg in clean and jerk. Out of India's 13 medals, nine have been won by weightlifters alone.
summary: परदीप सिंह ने CWG में भारत का 13 वां पदक जीतने के लिए 352 किग्रा वजन उठाया

text: Only six of the 59 airports guarded by CISF are equipped to defuse and dispose of explosives, an audit by the agency has found. Airports require 28 pieces of equipment, like explosive vapour detectors and remote-operated vehicles, for making explosive detection and disposal squads operational. These are only available at Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Cochin and Hyderabad airports.
summary: बमों को डिफ्यूज करने के लिए 59 हवाई अड्डों में से केवल 6: CISF ऑडिट

text: The Border Security Force is reportedly building 190 guest houses for jawans of constable and sub-constable rank to live with their families and spend more time with them. Aiming to reduce stress and fatigue, the facilities will be provided to newly-wed soldiers on priority. Jawans spend an average of five out of 30 years with family during service, reports said.
summary: सीमा पर जवानों के परिवारों के लिए गेस्ट हाउस बनाने के लिए बी.एस.एफ.

text: Indian Air Force stations and important installations in Punjab have been put on alert after intelligence agencies received inputs that the posts are being targetted by Pakistan-based terrorist organisations Jaish-e-Mohammed and Lashkar-e-Taiba. This comes after the Jaish-e-Mohammed issued a statement saying it would avenge the deaths of 13 militants killed in Kashmir this month.
summary: पंजाब IAF के ठिकानों को आतंकी समूहों से खतरे को लेकर अलर्ट पर रखा गया है

text: The Gujarat High Court has remarked "marital rape is not a husband's privilege" and called it an "injustice that must be criminalised". It called for abolishing the exemption under Section 375 of IPC which does not consider sex with wife as rape. The court said this while partly quashing a woman's FIR against her husband for alleged harassment and rape.
summary: वैवाहिक बलात्कार नहीं पति का विशेषाधिकार, अवैध होना चाहिए: HC

text: Slamming French President for meeting Syrian Kurdish militias last month, Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÃÂan said that "France aids, abets and supports terror". "You will not be able to rid yourself of this terror burden... you will sink," he added. Turkey had launched an operation against the Kurdish YPG militia, which it considers a terrorist organisation.
summary: फ्रांस एड्स, आतंक का समर्थन करता है और उसका समर्थन करता है: तुर्की प्रेज़ एर्दोआ। Etsan

text: The Russian Foreign Ministry has called the suspected chemical attack in Syria "fake news". The ministry said that the incident was being reported as a chemical attack to justify potential strikes against Syria. It further said that those who are not interested in a genuine political settlement of the Syrian crisis are seeking to complicate the situation on the ground.
summary: रूस ने सीरिया के रासायनिक हमले को कहा 'फर्जी खबर'

text: China has unveiled a cloud-seeding project intended to force rainfall and snow over an area roughly three times the size of Spain. As part of the plan, China will build combustion chambers to spray silver iodide towards the sky by burning solid fuel. China has been creating 55 billion tons of artificial rain every year since 2013.
summary: चीन स्पेन के आकार से 3 गुना अधिक क्षेत्र में बारिश करवाता है

text: The richest 1% are on track to own two-thirds of the world's wealth by 2030, as per a study by UK's House of Commons Library. Since 2008, the wealth of the top 1% has been growing twice as fast as the remaining 99%. If the trend continues, the top 1% would own about $305 trillion by 2030, the study said.
summary: 2030 तक सभी धन का दो-तिहाई हिस्सा सबसे अमीर: अध्ययन

text: Rajkummar Rao has said he wants to go higher in his career while adding, "This is not my best. My best is yet to come." He further said, "My biggest high is just to be in front of the camera and be on a film set." Rajkummar also spoke on success and said that sometimes, it can be a trap.
summary: यह मेरा सर्वश्रेष्ठ नहीं है, मेरा सर्वश्रेष्ठ अभी आना बाकी है: राजकुमार राव

text: Reacting to Salman Khan getting bail, former Bigg Boss contestant Sofia Hayat wrote on Instagram, "Inject yourself with steroids, teach the young it's ok to kill animals and people and abuse women." She added, "Throw a few dance moves in pants that are far too tight...and as long as you have these documents (referring to money)...you are king in India!
summary: युवाओं को सिखाता है कि जानवरों को मारना ठीक है: सलमान की जमानत पर सोफिया

text: KKR's part-time spinner Nitish Rana dismissed RCB's AB de Villiers and Virat Kohli off successive deliveries to take first two wickets of his IPL career today. Rana achieved the feat in the second over of his IPL career. Jacques Kallis and Thisara Perera are the other bowlers who have dismissed the duo off successive deliveries in same over in IPL.
summary: अंशकालिक स्पिनर ने कोहली को लगातार गेंदों पर आउट किया

text: KKR captain Dinesh Karthik slammed an unbeaten 35 off 29 deliveries to help his team chase down Virat Kohli-led RCB's 176 in the IPL on Sunday. Karthik has remained unbeaten in each of his last six professional cricket matches. The match saw KKR's Sunil Narine become the first batsman to score two IPL fifties in 17 or fewer balls.
summary: कार्तिक ने 6 वें मैच में नाबाद रहते हुए केकेआर को आरसीबी को हराया

text: After BSP supremo Mayawati said the BJP was "scared" following Dalit protests, BJP leader Thaawar Chand Gehlot said she is walking towards the path of violence which her mentor Kanshi Ram never believed in. Law Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad said the BSP, along with SP and Congress, was supporting violence across the country. Twelve people were killed during the protests.
summary: मायावती के विपरीत, कांशीराम हिंसा में कभी विश्वास नहीं करते थे: भाजपा

text: Addressing a rally in Karnataka, Congress President Rahul Gandhi on Saturday said Prime Minister Narendra Modi was scared of facing questions on corruption and was not letting the Parliament function. "Who stopped Parliament from running? The allies of BJP- the Telugu Desam Party (TDP)," he added. Replying to Gandhi, BJP leader CN Ashwath Narayan said TDP isn't in NDA.
summary: भ्रष्टाचार पर सवालों से घबरा गए पीएम मोदी: राहुल गांधी

text: Congress leader Nitin Raut said "angry" Dalits will play an important role in deciding who the next Prime Minister of the country will be. Adding that they'll choose Congress President Rahul Gandhi for the post, he said, "Dalits...are feeling angry under the NDA's regime. They are being denied educational, employment opportunities which never happened when the Congress was in power."
summary: अगला पीएम तय करने से नाराज दलित: कांग्रेसी नेता

text: The BJP on Sunday released its first list with 72 candidates for the Karnataka Assembly elections, to be held on May 12. The Chief Ministerial candidate of the party BS Yeddyurappa will be contesting from Shikaripura constituency, which he had won in 2013 on a ticket from Karnataka Jantha Paksha (KJP). The polls are being held for 224 seats.
summary: बीजेपी ने कर्नाटक चुनाव के उम्मीदवारों की पहली सूची जारी की

text: Two Dalit men, accused of blasphemy, were abused, thrashed, and paraded in Haryana's Fatehabad on Friday. A video of the incident went viral and miscreants will be identified based on the video, police have said. Meanwhile, the duo has been booked on the basis of a complaint filed by a man, stating they spoke ill of Bishnoi guru Jambheshwar.
summary: हरियाणा में परेड का आरोप लगाते हुए 2 लोगों ने पिटाई की

text: Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Saturday inaugurated swimming pools at two government schools in Mayur Vihar and Vinod Nagar. Stating that nobody had ever thought government schools could have swimming pools, Kejriwal added his government had shown that these schools could be improved. The pools, fitted with lane ropes, will reportedly help students prepare for national championships.
summary: दिल्ली सीएम ने 2 सरकारी स्कूलों में स्विमिंग पूल का उद्घाटन किया

text: The man who ploughed a minivan into a group of people outside a restaurant in the German city of Muenster appears to have had mental health problems, regional interior minister Herbert Reul has said. Confirming that police have ruled out terrorism, Reul said the man acted alone. Two people were killed and around 20 others were injured in the attack.
summary: वैन हमलावर को मानसिक स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं थीं: जर्मन मंत्री

text: Oil giant BP had claimed that an oil spill off the South Australian coast would be a "welcome boost" to local economies due to the "increased activity associated with cleanup operations". BP made the statements in March 2016 as part of its bid to drill in the region. Notably, BP's 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill is the largest in history.
summary: ऑस्ट्रेलिया में तेल रिसाव स्थानीय लोगों के लिए स्वागत योग्य होगा: बी.पी.

text: The Delhi HC has prohibited a trust and four firms from manufacturing, advertising or selling any goods bearing the Patanjali mark following a plea by Ramdev's Patanjali Ayurved. The plea argued that the firms were passing off their products as that of Patanjali's based on the authorisation of the trust, Maharishi Patanjali Vedic Foundation.
summary: दिल्ली उच्च न्यायालय ने पतंजलि ट्रेडमार्क के उल्लंघन को रोक दिया

text: Kings XI Punjab's wicketkeeper-batsman Lokesh Rahul smashed the fastest-ever fifty in IPL history off 14 balls against Delhi Daredevils on Sunday. The previous record was held jointly by Yusuf Pathan and Sunil Narine, who had scored a fifty off 15 balls each. The record for fastest T20 fifty is held jointly by Chris Gayle and Yuvraj Singh (12 balls).
summary: केएल राहुल 14 गेंदों में 50 रन बनाकर सबसे तेज आईपीएल खेल रहे हैं

text: A Sahara Samay journalist, Anuj Chaudhary, was shot at his residence in Uttar Pradesh's Ghaziabad by unidentified men on Sunday and has been rushed to the hospital. Initial probe has revealed that personal enmity was behind the attack, reports quoting police said. Ghaziabad Police tweeted that the force is on the spot and necessary action is being taken.
summary: गाजियाबाद में अज्ञात लोगों द्वारा पत्रकार को उसके घर पर गोली मार दी गई

text: Delhi Daredevils captain Gautam Gambhir slammed his 36th IPL fifty against Kings XI Punjab on Sunday to equal David Warner's record for the most number of fifties in the T20 league. The 36-year-old batsman has slammed nine fifties for Delhi Daredevils and 27 for Kolkata Knight Riders. Gambhir is playing for Daredevils for the first time since 2010.
summary: गंभीर ने डीडी की वापसी पर सबसे ज्यादा आईपीएल 50 के लिए वार्नर के रिकॉर्ड की बराबरी की

text: Afghanistan's Mujeeb Zadran, the first male cricketer born in the 21st century to play international cricket, has become the youngest to feature in the IPL. KXIP's Mujeeb achieved the feat, aged 17 years and 11 days, after taking the field against DD on Sunday. Sarfaraz Khan was the previous youngest (17 years and 177 days) to feature in the IPL.
summary: आईपीएल में खेलने के लिए सबसे कम उम्र के 2000 के बाद पैदा हुए 1 इंटन क्रिकेटर

text: RCB opener Brendon McCullum has become the second cricketer to reach 9,000 runs in T20s, achieving the feat against his former team KKR on Sunday. McCullum reached the milestone in his 330th T20, joining Chris Gayle, who has scored 11,068 runs in 323 T20 matches. Suresh Raina, with 7,382 runs, is the highest run-getter in T20s among Indian cricketers.
summary: मैकुलम टी 20 इतिहास में 9,000 रन बनाने वाले दूसरे खिलाड़ी हैं

text: NASA is set to launch the Parker Solar Probe, also being called as the humanity's first mission to the Sun, on July 31. The spacecraft will orbit directly through the solar atmosphere, closer than any human-made object has ever gone. The spacecraft, which will orbit at 64,37,376 km from the Sun, will have a speed of approximately 6,92,017 kmph.
summary: सन के लिए मानवता का पहला मिशन 31 जुलाई को लॉन्च होगा

text: Investigations based on WhatsApp messages led Delhi Police to a woman in Punjab who acquired the leaked CBSE Economics paper for her son. The woman had received the paper from her relative, Rakesh Kumar, a Centre Superintendent at a school in Himachal Pradesh. Kumar stole the Economics paper while collecting the Computer Science and Informatics Practices papers from a bank.
summary: CBSE अर्थशास्त्र के पेपर लीक का स्रोत पुलिस ने कैसे पता लगाया?

text: Alleging the US was encouraging India's heavy-handed approach, Pakistan's ambassador to the US Aizaz Ahmad Chaudhry said that peace will prevail in south Asia if US assumes the role of a balanced power-player. Last year, Pakistan said the US should treat Pakistan and India equally after it was put on notice by the US for providing safe havens to terrorists.
