text: The Supreme Court has allowed the Centre to provide reservation in promotions for SC/ST employees in all government departments till the issue is disposed of by the bench. The Centre had filed a plea against a Delhi High Court order quashing the reservation. The High Court had asked for a preliminary exercise to get data regarding lack of representation.
summary: SC, SC / ST कर्मचारियों के लिए पदोन्नति में सरकार को कोटा देने की अनुमति देता है

text: India on Monday began importing Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) from Russia as it received the first 3.4 trillion British thermal unit of cargo at Gujarat's Dahej terminal. India will be importing LNG worth an estimated $25 billion over 20 years from Russia. India is the world's fourth-largest buyer of LNG and imports the gas from Qatar, Australia and the US.
summary: भारत 20-साल के सौदे में रूस से एलएनजी का आयात शुरू करता है

text: The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation last week imposed a fine on 16 people for not picking up their pets' poop, during a three-day drive they implemented in areas including Mahalaxmi and Girgaum Chowpatty. According to the Greater Mumbai Cleanliness and Sanitation Byelaws, owners can be fined Ã¢ÂÂ¹500 for not picking up their pets' poop.
summary: 16 लोगों ने मुंबई में पालतू जानवरों का शिकार न करने के लिए जुर्माना लगाया

text: A senior Rajasthan policeman has said in court that two CBI officers forced him to give false statement in the Sohrabuddin Sheikh encounter case, becoming the 60th prosecution witness to turn hostile. The policeman, then an Investigating Officer in a murder case in which Sheikh was an accused, now serves as a deputy superintendent of the state police.
summary: 60 वां गवाह सोहराबुद्दीन एनकाउंटर मामले में शत्रुतापूर्ण हो गया

text: A Brazilian teen passed away on Monday after a shark bit off his penis while he was swimming at a beach in the city of Recife. The 18-year-old was swimming near the shore despite the area being marked by signs warning of shark attacks. Earlier, a man lost a hand and part of his leg on the same beach.
summary: ब्राजील के किशोर की मृत्यु हो जाने के बाद शार्क उसके लिंग को काट देती है

text: American rapper Kanye West has revealed that he was diagnosed with a "mental condition" at the age of 39. "But... it's not a disability, it's a superpower," he added. In his newly released album titled 'YE', the 40-year-old rapper has made references to bipolar disorder, a brain disorder that causes unusual shifts in mood and energy.

text: After Indian football captain Sunil Chhetri's plea resulted in packed stands, coach Stephen Constantine said, "I don't feel we should be begging people to watch the national team." He claimed the manner in which the team has been playing should be enough to draw the crowds. "I expect the stands to be full in the next two matches", he added.
summary: फुटबॉल टीम को लोगों से उन्हें देखने के लिए नहीं आना चाहिए: कोच

text: The founders of GitHub, the coding platform acquired by Microsoft for $7.5 billion, will own about 10 times more shares than Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella, according to Bloomberg. The all-stock deal is equivalent to 73.8 million shares, half of which would pass to GitHub's three founders. Among insiders, only Microsoft Co-founder Bill Gates' holding would exceed that of GitHub founders.
summary: GitHub ने CEO नडेला की तुलना में अधिक Microsoft स्टॉक के मालिक हैं

text: Karnataka CM HD Kumaraswamy on Tuesday said, "There is no difference between our (JD(S) and Congress) MLAs. They have given total freedom to party's president to select the future cabinet." Congress has the charge of 22 state ministries, including Home, Agriculture and Health, while JD(S) has the charge of Finance and 11 other portfolios.
summary: कैबिनेट को लेकर कांग-जेडी (एस) के बीच कोई मतभेद नहीं: केतका सीएम

text: Singapore-based Quek Siu Rui once declined a $100-million offer for his startup Carousell, which is now said to be valued at $500 million. In a recent interview, Rui said the startup was "once-in-a-lifetime opportunity" and he wants to build an enduring company. Carousell, which was founded in 2012, is a mobile classifieds app for person-to-person buying and selling.
summary: मैन ने एक बार स्टार्टअप के लिए $ 100 मिलियन को अस्वीकार कर दिया था, अब इसकी कीमत $ 500 मिलियन है

text: Uttar Pradesh's Mughal Sarai Junction has officially been renamed as Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Junction, after President Ram Nath Kovind gave his assent to the state government's proposal. The renaming was earlier approved by the Railways Ministry after the state cleared it in 2017. Notably, BJP idealogue Upadhyaya was found dead under mysterious circumstances near the railway station in 1968.
summary: प्रीज़ ने मुगल सराय स्टेशन का नामकरण दीन दयाल उपाध्याय के नाम पर कर दिया

text: A Jaguar fighter jet of the Indian Air Force on Tuesday crashed in Mundra district in Gujarat's Kutch region during a routine training mission. Pilot Air Commodore Sanjay Chauhan has lost his life in the incident. This comes months after an IAF helicopter crashed in Assam during an emergency landing and killed two pilots.
summary: गुजरात में IAF के फाइटर जेट के क्रैश होने के बाद पायलट की मौत

text: Talking about Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana, PM Narendra Modi on Tuesday said, "We've been working to free the housing sector from middlemen, corruption and ensuring that the beneficiaries get their own home without hassles." Adding that the scheme is creating employment opportunities, PM Modi stated, "We're working on skill development to enable faster and better quality construction of the houses."
summary: आवास क्षेत्र को भ्रष्टाचार से मुक्त करने के लिए काम कर रहे सरकार: पीएम मोदी

text: As many as 7.14 lakh candidates have cleared the 2018 National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET), of which the highest number, 76,778, were from Uttar Pradesh. Over 72,000 and 70,000 aspirants cleared the entrance from Kerala and Maharashtra respectively. An estimated 13.36 lakh candidates had registered, however, only 12.69 lakh candidates appeared for the test.
summary: उत्तर प्रदेश के अधिकांश सफल NEET उम्मीदवार

text: A video has surfaced online wherein locals of Kotli district in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK) can be seen accusing Pakistan security forces of illegal encroachment. Locals, who were standing in a group, could be heard saying, "What is your right to do this? You first captured our estate and now you are capturing our plots. We will not leave."
summary: पीओके में स्थानीय लोगों ने पाकिस्तानी सेना पर जमीन कब्जाने का आरोप लगाया

text: An 18-year-old woman, Safaa Boular, has become UK's youngest convicted female Islamic State terrorist after a court found her guilty of plotting a terror attack on the British Museum in London. She plotted the attack with UK's first all-woman terror cell. Boular was also found guilty of an earlier attempt to travel to Syria to join ISIS militants.
summary: 18 साल की उम्र में ब्रिटेन की सबसे कम उम्र की दोषी महिला ISIS आतंकवादी बन जाती है

text: The death toll from the most violent eruption of Guatemala's Fuego volcano in over four decades rose to 69 on Monday. Authorities said they will have to use other anthropological methods and take DNA samples to identify those killed as "the dead have lost their features or their fingerprints". President Jimmy Morales travelled to survey the disaster area.

text: State-owned Russian television channel Russia-1 photoshopped a smile onto North Korean leader Kim Jong-un's face in a recent broadcast of his meeting with Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov. However, the photograph released by Russia's Foreign Ministry shows Kim Jong-un unsmiling. Meanwhile, the broadcast's host said the image was not altered.
summary: किम जोंग-उन के चेहरे पर रूसी टीवी चैनल के फोटोशोप की मुस्कान है

text: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, while responding to reports that Taapsee Pannu rejected a thriller film over being cast with him, said he was never approached for the film. "I was never a part of any thriller film. So basically it's all baseless," he wrote. Earlier, Taapsee had also denied rumours that she rejected a film because she was paired with Nawazuddin.
summary: नवाज़ुद्दीन ने उनके साथ फिल्म को अस्वीकार करने की अफवाह का जवाब दिया

text: Zimbabwe cricketers have stopped attending practice sessions and have threatened to boycott the tri-series against Pakistan and Australia in July over pending salaries from Zimbabwe's cricket board. The board owes three months' salary and match fees from Zimbabwe's tour of Sri Lanka last year. India's former team manager Lalchand Rajput is set to join Zimbabwe as their coach next week.
summary: Zim खिलाड़ियों ने अभ्यास बंद कर दिया, अवैतनिक शुल्क पर बहिष्कार की धमकी दी

text: Japan is planning to launch a self-driving car service in Tokyo by 2020, according to a government strategic review announced on Monday. The strategy also includes plans to allow the development of virtual power plants by the fiscal year ending March 2022. The government will then try to commercialise the system as early as 2022, as per the review.
summary: जापान की 2020 तक टोक्यो में ड्राइवरलेस कार प्रणाली शुरू करने की योजना है

text: Apple has introduced the latest version of its desktop operating system called 'macOS Mojave'. Some of its features include 'Dark Mode' that transforms the desktop to a darkened colour scheme, and 'Stacks', which organizes messy desktops by automatically stacking files into neat groups. Group FaceTime will allow users to video chat with multiple people at the same time.
summary: Apple ने नवीनतम डेस्कटॉप ऑपरेटिंग सिस्टम macOS Mojave का खुलासा किया

text: Union Health Minister JP Nadda on Monday said that Nipah virus outbreak in Kerala was the result of "tampering with nature" but wasn't a man-made problem. "Every person suffering from the virus has been mapped and those in contact with such patients have been detected," the minister added. At least 16 people have died in Kerala due to the virus.
summary: निपा वायरस का परिणाम प्रकृति के साथ छेड़छाड़: जेपी नड्डा

text: A 35-year old mentally challenged man died in Hyderabad after four policemen allegedly tied his hands and dumped him on a highway for being a nuisance. The accused had just rescued the victim from a violent mob which suspected him of being a child abductor, reports said. However, a shepherd witnessed the incident and alerted the local police.
summary: 4 T'gana पुलिस ने अपने हाथों को बांधने के बाद आदमी को मर दिया, उसे सड़क पर फेंक दिया

text: After five days of violence in Shillong, the Meghalaya government has decided to form a special committee to find a "permanent solution" for the relocation of the sweeper colony where the clashes had broken out. An altercation between a Punjabi woman and a Khasi youth had triggered the clashes, following which protestors clashed with the police as well.
summary: मेघालय शिलांग हिंसा के समाधान के लिए पैनल का गठन करता है

text: A man was beaten to death in Haryana's Sonipat allegedly over sharing pictures he clicked with his family members on a WhatsApp group. The victim's brother said he had accidentally shared the pictures on the group, which angered one of the recipient. The accused invited the man and his family to his home and attacked them with rods and bricks.
summary: व्हाट्सएप ग्रुप पर फैमिली पिक्स शेयर करने को लेकर मारा गया शख्स

text: A Delhi court has extended protection from arrest to senior Congress leader P Chidambaram till July 10 as the Enforcement Directorate sought more time to file a reply in the Aircel-Maxis case. The case relates to then Finance Minister Chidambaram approving Foreign Direct Investment of Ã¢ÂÂ¹3,500 crore in Aircel-Maxis deal while having the authority to approve up to Ã¢ÂÂ¹600 crore.
summary: चिदंबरम को एयरसेल-मैक्सिस मामले में गिरफ्तारी से सुरक्षा मिली

text: The Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC) has decided to cut down the quantity of the meals and focus on improving the quality, reports said. IRCTC will serve boneless chicken, discontinue soup, and will add a serving of dry vegetable. This comes after the Railway Board allowed the corporation to rationalise the menu instead of increasing the prices.
summary: IRCTC मात्रा में कटौती, ट्रेन के भोजन की गुणवत्ता में सुधार

text: At least 31 people have been killed on the 94-km Mumbai-Pune expressway in the past four months. Most of the deaths resulted due to stationary vehicles being rammed into by other vehicles because of low visibility or high speed. As many as 55 accidents involving stationary vehicles on the expressway were reported in January and February this year.
summary: 4 महीने में मुंबई-पुणे एक्सप्रेसवे पर 31 की मौत

text: The probe into the nerve agent attack on former Russian spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter Yulia cost the UK's Wiltshire police alone more than ÃÂ£7 million (Ã¢ÂÂ¹62 crore).  Describing the investigation as a "national operation which must be paid for nationally", Wiltshire's crime commissioner Angus Macpherson said he has asked the central government to pay the bill.

text: Singapore police's Gurkha Contingent will guard the historic meeting between US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un to be held on June 12 in the country, with khukris and assault rifles. Khukri, a heavy curved knife, is used as a traditional weapon by the Gurkhas, who have been recruited from Nepal.

text: Asserting that enemies of Iran will never be able to halt its nuclear progress, Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Monday said, "It is their bad dream and will not happen." He added that Iran should be prepared to increase its uranium enrichment capacity if the 2015 nuclear deal with world powers falls apart.

text: Travel company, Thomas Cook India, has launched flight inclusive America holiday package for 10 nights starting at Ã¢ÂÂ¹2,62,450/- . Capture the breathtaking views of the Niagara Falls, visit Universal Studios or avail one of the exciting optional tours to Yellowstone National Park with this package including accommodation, breakfast, sightseeing and transfers as per itinerary.
summary: थॉमस कुक यूएसए के अवकाश पैकेज प्रस्तुत करता है

text: Apple on Monday unveiled its latest software iOS 12 for iPhones and iPads at WWDC 2018. Some of the features include 'Do Not Disturb' that doesn't show app notifications during a pre-selected bedtime, while 'Group Notifications' allows easier clearing of notifications from the same app or topic. 'Memoji' will let users create personalised Animojis that look similar to them.

text: The limited edition Silk White variant of OnePlus 6 is now available on Amazon.in and OnePlus.in. The glass back has been precisely polished to create a restrained elegance in both look and feel and the subtle shimmering effect is achieved using a sprinkling of pearl powder. Priced at  Ã¢ÂÂ¹39,999, the variant comes with 8GB RAM and 128GB internal storage.

text: A US-based study has found that the average day length on Earth is growing by 1/75,000 second per year, as the Moon is slowly drifting apart. Researchers also claimed Earth had a 18.7-hour rotational period 1.4 billion years ago. They further predicted the Moon would reach a stable distance when it will be visible only from one half of Earth.

text: Actor and ex-Bigg Boss contestant Armaan Kohli has been booked for allegedly assaulting his live-in partner Neeru Randhawa following an argument over monetary issues. "He...banged my head against the floor...The wound was so deep that I had to undergo a surgery," said Neeru. Armaan is currently absconding and a team is searching for him, as per a senior police officer.
summary: बिग बॉस के प्रतियोगी अरमान ने प्रेमिका के साथ मारपीट करने का मामला दर्ज कराया

text: The Centre has announced a comprehensive package of more than Ã¢ÂÂ¹8,000 crore to provide relief to sugarcane farmers and to clear their dues, which have crossed over Ã¢ÂÂ¹22,000 crore. The interventions include increase in custom duty on import of sugar, removal of custom duty on export of sugar, and the creation of buffer stock at the cost of Ã¢ÂÂ¹1,200 crore.

text: The Kerala government will cover the medical expenses of the patients infected with Nipah virus in Kozhikode and Malappuram, CM Pinarayi Vijayan has said. Praising state health officials, he said that the state has been the quickest to contain the disease when compared to other countries. Kerala will provide free ration to around 2,500 people under observation, he added.

text: Accusing India of carrying out over 1,000 ceasefire violations since the beginning of the year, Pakistan Army spokesperson Major General Asif Ghafoor on Monday said, "We are two nuclear powers, and there is no space for war." Stating that Pakistan wished to respect the truce agreement, he added, "Our defence, our desire for peace, should not be mistaken for weakness."
summary: हम परमाणु शक्तियां हैं, भारत के साथ युद्ध के लिए कोई स्थान नहीं: पाक सेना

text: Paramilitary forces and intelligence personnel have been stationed across Amritsar ahead of the 34th anniversary of Operation Blue Star. Meanwhile, a radical group has threatened to organise a shutdown in the city on June 6. The Indian Army had stormed the Golden Temple in the first week of June 1984 to kill extremist Sikh leader Jarnail Singh Bhindranwale.
summary: 'ओप ब्लू स्टार' की सालगिरह से पहले अमृतसर में कड़ी सुरक्षा

text: US President Donald Trump on Monday tweeted, "I have the absolute right to PARDON myself, but why would I do that when I have done nothing wrong?" This comes while he is being investigated for Russian links to his presidential election campaign. Earlier, Trump's personal lawyer Rudy Giuliani had argued that the constitution "doesn't say he can't" pardon himself.
summary: मुझे खुद को माफ करने का पूर्ण अधिकार है: यूएस प्रेज डोनाल्ड ट्रम्प

text: A school in the UK's Oxfordshire has banned boys from wearing shorts during summers and has instead asked them to wear skirts if they find trousers uncomfortable. The school said its gender-neutral uniform policy allows only trousers or skirts as legwear. Notably, several schools in the UK have adopted gender-neutral uniform policy to protect transgender students from discrimination.
summary: यूके स्कूल लड़कों को शॉर्ट्स पहनने से रोकता है, स्कर्ट की अनुमति देता है

text: Slamming Priyanka Chopra's American TV show 'Quantico', a Twitter user wrote, "This is real anti national." The tweet referred to the latest episode where 'Indian nationalists' were reportedly shown framing Pakistan for trying to blow up Manhattan in New York. "Couldn't Priyanka ask the 'Quantico' team to change the narrative," asked another user while adding, "I'm truly ashamed of Priyanka."
summary: प्रियंका यह देश विरोधी है, ट्विटर यूजर क्वांटिको का नारा लगाते हैं

text: A scene in the upcoming film 'Sanju', where actress Madhuri Dixit has been referred to, was removed on the actress' insistence, as per reports. Director Rajkumar Hirani reportedly shot a scene where Ranbir Kapoor as Sanjay Dutt makes a call to her after his arrest. Sanjay and Madhuri were rumoured to be in a relationship in the early '90s.
summary: माधुरी का संदर्भ अनुरोध पर 'संजू' से हटा दिया गया: रिपोर्ट

text: Taapsee Pannu has said that she has heard stories of sexual harassment in Bollywood but she herself has not faced any sexual harassment, otherwise she would've probably helped voicing it. "It is not that it does not happen, it does...People probably aren't ready to openly talk about it because there are a lot of taboos attached to it," she added.
summary: टैससे कहते हैं, 'B'wood में यौन उत्पीड़न की कहानियाँ सुनीं

text: 'Game of Thrones' actor Jason Momoa, who played the role of Khal Drogo in the show, shared a short clip on Instagram with his co-star Emilia Clarke who plays his wife Daenerys Targaryen, captioning it, "Moon of my life." Emilia too posted a picture of both of them where Jason can be seen carrying her.
summary: मेरे जीवन का चाँद एमिलिया: को-स्टार पर GOT का खल ड्रोगो अभिनेता

text: Afghanistan's 19-year-old leg-spinner Rashid Khan, who is currently in Dehradun for the T20I series against Bangladesh, said he has "not gone home in a year" and that he misses his "family a lot". "I try to (be in) the best possible frame of mind to give good performance...so that troubled people back home get something to cheer about," he added.

text: Indian football team captain Sunil Chhetri scored with a chip from outside the goalkeeping area in the 92nd minute in India's 3-0 win over Kenya in Mumbai on Monday. Chhetri, who scored a brace in the match, made a run after a through ball from Balwant Singh and took a single touch before chipping it over the goalkeeper.

text: Coach Pullela Gopichand is training PV Sindhu and Saina Nehwal at different centres of his academy since the two players are reportedly not comfortable with each other following their gold medal match in the Commonwealth Games 2018. "In the interest of the players, our coaching team has taken this decision," Gopichand said on being asked about the different training venues.
summary: गोपीचंद ने साइना, सिंधु को अलग-अलग स्थानों पर प्रशिक्षण दिया, सी.डब्ल्यू.जी.

text: FIFA has handed a Ã¢ÂÂ¹14-lakh fine to England's Football Association after an England player drank a non-sponsored drink during a match. An England player was seen sipping the non-sponsored drink during England's Under-20 World Cup campaign last year. FA will register an official complaint as FIFA earlier fined Russia just Ã¢ÂÂ¹20 lakh over 'monkey chants' directed at French players.
summary: इंग्लैंड ने खिलाड़ी के गैर-प्रायोजित पेय के रूप में s lakh14 लाख का जुर्माना लगाया

text: BJP has written to Mizoram Chief Secretary Arvind Ray seeking action against Manorama News for allegedly slandering newly-appointed Governor Kummanam Rajasekharan on the day of his swearing-in ceremony. BJP alleged that the news channel played an audio clip synchronised with visuals of BJP President Amit Shah, which implied that Shah was insulting Kummanam by saying "every dog has his day".

text: A 70% complete skeleton of an unidentified dinosaur was sold for Ã¢ÂÂ¬2 million (Ã¢ÂÂ¹15.7 crore) at the Eiffel Tower in Paris on Monday. The bones of what scientists believe to be "probably a new species" of the carnivorous allosaurus were discovered at Wyoming, US, in 2013. The 9-metre-long, 2.6-metre-high dinosaur lived during the late Jurassic period 150 million years ago.

text: A 17-year-old girl was found dead in Tamil Nadu hours after she failed her second attempt at NEET, the results of which were declared on Monday. Police suspect that she may have committed suicide by consuming rat poison. Last year, 17-year-old S Anitha had committed suicide after failing to clear NEET, leading to widespread protests in Tamil Nadu.

text: In a letter addressed to Christians, Archbishop of Goa and Daman Father Filipe Neri Ferrao wrote, "Human rights are under attack and democracy appears to be in peril...various minorities fear for their safety." "Our Constitution is in danger...as the general elections are fast approaching, we must strive to know our constitution better and work harder to protect it," he added.

text: Delhi has recorded a 52.8% increase in drunk driving cases in 2018 as compared to last year, according to police records. Between January and May this year, as many as 15,450 motorists  were prosecuted for drunk driving and over 7,000 vehicles impounded or seized. Over 80% accidents due to drunken driving occur between 1 am and 4 am, officials said.
summary: दिल्ली में इस साल नशे के मामले में 52.8% की वृद्धि दर्ज की गई

text: Jet Airways crew helped in saving a man's life who collapsed after suffering a heart attack onboard a Mumbai-Kolkata flight recently. The man had suffered the attack an hour after the departure, following which the crew rushed to his aid and the flight was taken back to Mumbai for proper medical treatment. The crew was lauded for their quick decision-making.
summary: जेट एयरवेज चालक दल जहाज पर दिल का दौरा पड़ने वाले व्यक्ति की मदद करता है

text: Indian football team captain Sunil Chhetri marked his 100th international appearance with two goals in India's 3-0 victory over Kenya in the Intercontinental Cup on Monday. Chhetri, who is the third best active international goal-scorer after Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi, has now scored 61 international goals. Notably, all the tickets for the match were sold out following Chhetri's plea.
summary: छेत्री ने अपने 100 वें मैच में दो बार भारत को केन्या को हराया

text: Bihar's 18-year-old Kalpana Kumari, who attended coaching classes in Delhi, got 691 out of 720 marks or 99.99 percentile to top CBSE's NEET 2018. She appeared for Class 12 board examination conducted by Bihar board this year. "She wishes to get into AIIMS, Delhi. Her second preference is Maulana Azad Medical College, Delhi," her sister said.
summary: NEET 2018 की 18 वर्षीय टॉपर कल्पना कुमारी कौन हैं?

text: An off-duty FBI agent dropped his gun while performing a backflip on the dance floor at a bar in US' Denver and accidentally shot a man. The bullet hit the leg of a man who was rushed to a hospital and is reportedly stable. A 32-second video of the incident was widely shared on social media.
summary: एफबीआई एजेंट बैकफ्लिप के दौरान बंदूक छोड़ देता है, गलती से आदमी को गोली मार देता है

text: The first-ever sanctioned and legal bare-knuckle boxing championship was held in USA's Wyoming on Saturday after a gap of nearly 130 years. The matches, which featured former MMA and underground bare-knuckle fighters, saw several bloodied faces and an 18-second knockout. Out of all the matches held at the event, only one match featured women fighters.
summary: 130 साल बाद आयोजित पहली कानूनी नंगे पोर लड़ सीएचआई

text: Congress President Rahul Gandhi on Monday claimed that the interviews given by PM Narendra Modi on public platforms were pre-scripted. He also tweeted a video of PM Modi's interview in Singapore, wherein the person translating PM Modi's answers read out information which was not included in the Prime Minister's speech. Rahul claimed PM Modi's spontaneous response would be an "embarrassment".
summary: राहुल ने पीएम पर सिंगापुर में स्क्रिप्टेड इंटरव्यू देने का आरोप लगाया

text: Maharashtra Police on Monday stopped Congress MLAs Virendra Jagtap and Yashmomati Thaku from setting fire to themselves. They were leading a "silent mocha" against the district administration after it failed to reply to the party's demand of urging the government to procure pulses from farmers. Police officials dressed in civilian clothes stopped the MLAs before they poured kerosene on themselves.

text: The Centre has agreed to deploy around 1,000 security personnel of paramilitary forces in Meghalaya's Shillong amid violence and communal tension in the capital. Police were forced to use tear gas against protestors after they toppled police vehicles and assaulted a cop on Sunday. The clashes were triggered after a Khasi bus conductor was assaulted last week.
summary: हिंसा के बीच शिलांग में 1,000 जवान तैनात किए जाने हैं

text: The Tamil Nadu government on Monday announced its decision to release 67 life-term prisoners, who have served at least 10 years in jail. The move is aimed to commemorate the 100th birth anniversary of late Chief Minister MG Ramachandran. Governor Banwarilal Purohit will approve the proposed releases after reviewing each case based on the convict's criminal and health records.
summary: टीएन ने 67 आजीवन दोषियों को रिहा किया जिन्होंने 10 साल की सजा काट ली है

text: The 40-year-old owner of an eatery near Kolkata was shot dead on Sunday after asking a customer named Mohammad Firoz to pay earlier dues of Ã¢ÂÂ¹190. Firoz and three others asked the eatery owner for biriyani but refused to pay, claiming he was overcharging. Following this, he asked them to clear their earlier dues and this led to an altercation.
summary: Eatery के मालिक ने Ã 90190 के बिल के ऊपर से गोली मारकर हत्या कर दी

text: Social activist Tamanna Hashmi has filed a complaint against Union Agriculture Minister Radha Mohan Singh for calling the ongoing farmers' protest a means to grab media attention. Hashmi said that the comments made by the minister were an insult to the farmers. Farmers across seven states are on strike, demanding minimum support price and implementation of Swaminathan Commission recommendations.
summary: किसान विरोध स्टंट बोलने के लिए मंत्री के खिलाफ शिकायत

text: As many as 13 people died in separate incidents, ten of which were cases of drowning, during the first monsoon weekend in Maharashtra. Five people, including a family of four, drowned at a beach in Ratnagiri, while two cousins from Thane drowned when they accidentally walked into a ditch of water. Three others were electrocuted in separate incidents on Saturday.
summary: महाराष्ट्र में पहले मानसून सप्ताहांत के दौरान 13 लोग मारे गए

text: The Kerala Health Department has said the highly dangerous phase of Nipah virus outbreak is over. Reportedly, no one has been infected with the virus since May 17 and the second phase, which was likely to take place after May 20, has not occurred. Health Minister KK Shyalaja said vigilance against the disease will continue till June 30.
summary: निपाह के अत्यधिक खतरनाक चरण का प्रकोप: केरल सरकार

text: At least 14 people have been killed in a suicide bomb explosion targeting a gathering of the Afghan Ulema Council, shortly after the country's top religious body issued a fatwa declaring suicide attacks "haram". The council had called on the Afghan government forces and the Taliban to halt the ongoing conflict and agree on a ceasefire.
summary: अफ़गानिस्तान के मौलवियों पर बमबारी करना आत्मघाती बम विस्फोट पर प्रतिबंध लगाना है

text: Telecom industry body COAI has said that issues with Jio could have been resolved through dialogue as a lawsuit against the association makes a good relationship difficult with the member. Jio sued COAI and its Director General Rajan Mathews for defamation. COAI in a press statement in September 2016 said that Jio entered the sector as a "back door operator".
summary: जब सदस्य हमारे खिलाफ मुकदमा करता है तो रिश्ता कठिन हो जाता है: JIO पर COAI

text: Kareena Kapoor Khan's wedding dress in 'Veere Di Wedding', which was designed by designer duo Abu Jani and Sandeep Khosla, was made 25 years ago. "It was lying in our coffers...(producer) Rhea Kapoor came to the factory and we started...taking out old pieces," said Sandeep. While the skirt and blouse remained the same, the dupatta was created and modernised slightly.

text: Sanjeev Shrivastava, who has been dubbed as 'dancing uncle' on social media after his video went viral, said that he met actor Suniel Shetty while adding, "He told me he will plan something for me soon." Sanjeev, who also met actress Neelam, added, "She congratulated me for having brought the song alive after so long."
summary: सुनील ने मेरे लिए कुछ प्लान किया: वायरल वीडियो का 'डांसिंग अंकल'

text: Talking about finalising the right film for Bobby Deol, Salman Khan said, "I am personally looking into the story...locking the director for the film. The script will bring Bobby back as a Greek God." Salman further said, "If Bobby thought he worked hard for 'Race 3', he does not know what is coming."
summary: फिल्म में बॉबी को ग्रीक गॉड के रूप में वापस लाने की योजना: सलमान

text: Tunisia's goalkeeper Mouez Hassen allegedly faked an injury to let his teammates break their Ramadan fast during their side's pre-World Cup friendly match against Turkey. During the break in play, the players were seen eating dates, drinking water and energy drinks before continuing play. Reports claim that players have an understanding between them about the fake injury.
summary: गोआली ने टीम के साथियों को रमजान के उपवास को तोड़ने के लिए 'फेक' की चोट दी

text: Reacting to five-time Ballon d'Or-winner Lionel Messi's magazine photo shoot with goats, a user tweeted, "Goats with the GOAT (Greatest of All Time)." "Why's Messi holding Ronaldo?" another user wrote. Other tweets read, "Imagine taking pictures with goats to prove you're the GOAT," and "When will you make Ronaldo do a photo shoot with dolphin?"
summary: बकरी के साथ बकरी, बकरी के साथ मेस्सी के चित्रों पर उपयोगकर्ता ट्वीट करता है

text: World number one Rafael Nadal on Monday defeated Germany's Maximilian Marterer in straight sets to register his 900th career win and enter the French Open quarter-finals for the 12th time. Nadal is only the second active and fifth male player overall to register 900 wins in the Open Era. Nadal will face world number 12 Diego Schwartzman in the quarter-finals.
summary: नडाल ने 12 वें फ्रेंच ओपन क्वार्टर में प्रवेश करने के लिए 900 वां मैच जीता

text: Kings XI Punjab and Karnataka batsman Mayank Agarwal has tied the knot with his long-time girlfriend Aashita Sood. The 27-year-old, who scored over 2,000-plus runs in the last domestic season, had proposed to Aashita in December 2017 at the London Eye. Kings XI Punjab opener KL Rahul was among the attendees at the wedding.
summary: KXIP के मयंक अग्रवाल ने प्रेमिका आशिता के साथ शादी की

text: Former New Zealand cricket captain Brendon McCullum returned to play rugby after a gap of 18 years. The 36-year-old also suffered a groin injury during the match.
summary: ब्रेंडन मैकुलम 18 साल के अंतराल के बाद रग्बी में लौटे

text: A 25-year-old rape survivor was hospitalised today after two motorcycle-borne assailants threw an acid-like substance on her while she was on her way to a Chandigarh court. The police said she did not receive severe injuries but was being treated for burning in the eyes. She had accused a Jammu youth of raping her at a hotel last year.
summary: चंडीगढ़ रेप सर्वाइवर ने कोर्ट जाने के दौरान उस पर हमला किया

text: A trader was arrested by Assam Police on Monday for allegedly posting communally sensitive and pro-Pakistan comments from the Facebook account of his neighbour to spite him. After the comments were shared on Ahedul Ali's page, his shop was burned down and he was briefly detained. The police later tracked down the IP address and arrested shop owner Jyotish Nath.
summary: मैन पड़ोसी के एफबी खाते से पाक समर्थक टिप्पणियां पोस्ट करता है

text: A 65-year-old man was shot dead by two youths for opposing their attempts to sexually harass his daughter, the Uttar Pradesh Police said on Monday. The deceased and the youth are residents of the same locality, and a search has been launched to nab the accused. The incident occurred in the Rampuri area in Muzaffarnagar.
summary: मैन ने अपनी बेटी की पूर्व संध्या का विरोध करने पर गोली मारकर हत्या कर दी

text: US-led coalition air strikes on the Islamic State militant group killed 12 members of the same family last week, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights has said. The coalition had admitted that its air strikes have "unintentionally" killed nearly 900 civilians in Syria and Iraq. Around 3.5 lakh people have been killed in Syrian war since it started in 2011.
summary: सीरिया में अमेरिकी हवाई हमले में एक ही परिवार के 12 सदस्य मारे गए

text: All the tickets for India's football match against Kenya today in Mumbai have been sold out, two days after Indian skipper Sunil Chhetri posted a video urging people to show up for matches in stadiums. The stadium, which has a capacity of around 18,000, also hosted India's last match which had only 2,500 spectators, following which Chhetri posted the video.
summary: भारतीय फुटबॉल टीम का मैच छेत्री की याचिका के बाद बिक गया

text: Technology major Microsoft today announced the acquisition of the world's largest collaborative coding platform GitHub for $7.5 billion in an all-stock deal. Founded in 2008, GitHub has never turned profitable till date and was trying for nine months to find a new CEO.  Microsoft's Corporate VP Nat Friedman will become GitHubÃ¢ÂÂs new CEO after the acquisition closes later this year.

text: A 28-year-old UPSC aspirant allegedly committed suicide in Delhi's Rajendra Nagar on Sunday after he was denied entry into the examination hall for arriving late. Police reportedly found a suicide note at his residence which read, "The rules are fine but there should be some leniency." An investigation into the incident is underway.
summary: यूपीएससी के उम्मीदवार ने परीक्षा हॉल में प्रवेश से इनकार कर दिया, आत्महत्या कर ली

text: Google Translate converts 'I am a flat-earther' to 'Je suis un fou' in French which translates to 'I am a crazy person' in English. A Google spokesperson explained that it was an 'error' and the company was working on a fix. 'Flat-earther' is used for people who believe the Earth is not spherical but shaped like a plane or disk.
summary: Google 'मैं पागल हूँ' के लिए 'मैं सपाट-सुराख़ हूँ' का अनुवाद करता हूँ

text: Kareena Kapoor Khan and Sonam Kapoor starrer 'Veere Di Wedding' has replaced Alia Bhatt starrer 'Raazi' to become this year's fifth highest opening weekend grosser with a collection of Ã¢ÂÂ¹36.52 crore. 'Raazi' had earned Ã¢ÂÂ¹30.83 crore as its first weekend collection. Meanwhile, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh starrer 'Padmaavat' continues to be the top opening weekend grosser of 2018.
summary: 'वीरे दी ...' 2018 की 5 वीं सबसे पहली 1 सप्ताहांत की कमाई करने वाली फिल्म बनी

text: Twenty three-time Grand Slam champion Serena Williams has pulled out of the French Open with pectoral injury, an hour before she was set to play five-time Grand Slam champion Maria Sharapova in the Round of 16 on Monday. "I love playing (against) Maria...It's extremely disappointing," Serena said. The 36-year-old American had beaten Sharapova in each of their previous 18 matches.
summary: शारापोवा मैच से पहले सेरेना फ्रेंच ओपन से बाहर हो गई

text: Himachal Pradesh CM Jairam Thakur on Monday flagged off a helicopter taxi service that will reduce the travel time between Shimla and Chandigarh to 20 minutes, against the nearly 3.5 hours by road. The service, operated by Pawan Hans, can accommodate 19 persons on each sortie and will charge Ã¢ÂÂ¹2,999 per person.
summary: शिमला-चंडीगढ़ यात्रा के समय में कटौती करने के लिए शुरू की गई हैली-टैक्सी 20 मिनट

text: As many as 2,646 people committed suicide in 2015 due to "failure in examination," according to data released by the National Crime Records Bureau. The deceased accounted for 2% of all suicides in 2015. The number was slightly lower in 2014, with 2,403 people killing themselves after failing their exams.
summary: परीक्षा के कारण 2015 में 2,600 से अधिक लोगों ने आत्महत्या की

text: After undergoing a kidney transplant, Union Minister Arun Jaitley on Monday tweeted, "Delighted to be back at Home." Expressing gratitude towards doctors and medical staff for looking after him for over three weeks, he thanked his friends and colleagues for wishing for his recovery. Railways Minister Piyush Goyal had been given additional charge of Finance Ministry till Jaitley recovers.
summary: घर वापस आने में देरी: किडनी प्रत्यारोपण के बाद जेटली

text: Test result from the National Institute of Virology in Pune has confirmed that the 27-year-old jawan from Kerala, who recently passed away in Kolkata, did not die due to Nipah virus infection. The soldier's health had begun failing after he had gone to Kerala on a one-month leave. This prompted suspicion that his death was caused by the virus.
summary: परीक्षण से पुष्टि हुई कि केरल के जवान निप्पा वायरस से नहीं मरे थे

text: A police officer has sustained injuries after cow smugglers opened fire at the police in Rajasthan's Bharatpur district on Sunday. The incident occurred when police stopped the truck which was being used to smuggle over 20 cows. Both accused have been arrested and police said one of the men was accused of murder earlier.
summary: गाय तस्करों के रूप में घायल राजस्थान पुलिस में खुली आग

text: In violation of norms, the Women and Child Development Ministry revealed a sexual harassment victim's name in its press note after she met Union Minister Maneka Gandhi. The victim, an air hostess working for Air India, alleged she was sexually harassed by a senior executive for six years. The note was later replaced with a version without the name.
summary: डब्ल्यूसीडी मंत्रालय ने एयर इंडिया के यौन उत्पीड़न पीड़ित के नाम का खुलासा किया

text: A 59-year-old woman from Jharkhand's Dumri allegedly starved to death on Sunday after she didn't get food for at least three days. District officials said that the woman died due to the negligence of authorities, who failed to provide her with a ration card. Dumri MLA Jagarnath Mahto said he will raise the matter in the Assembly.
summary: झारखंड की महिला ने 3 दिन तक खाना नहीं खाने पर की मौत

text: A 98-year-old house was moved nearly 54 metres and rotated 90 degree to make room for a commercial building in China's Shanghai. The displacement process began in April and parts of the building were reinforced to ensure it survived the relocation. The contractor revealed that the building was moved by computer-controlled hydraulic machines along a guide rail.
summary: वीडियो: ९ house वर्षीय चीन के घर ५४ मीटर, घुमाया ९ ० डिग्री

text: The government has appointed IDBI Bank's Managing Director and CEO Mahesh Kumar Jain as a Deputy Governor at the RBI. Jain, who has more than 30 years of experience in banking, has previously served as the CEO of state-run Indian Bank. The post of RBI Deputy Governor fell vacant after SS Mundra retired at the end of July 2017.
summary: IDBI बैंक के सीईओ महेश जैन ने RBI के डिप्टी गवर्नर की नियुक्ति की

text: Actor Salman Khan has said that he is working harder because the newcomers are quite good at what they do. He added, "Today, I think keeping up with the juniors and their fan-following is ten times harder." Salman further said, "We are going to give the younger ones a hard time, but it is not easy."
summary: मैं कड़ी मेहनत कर रहा हूं क्योंकि नए कलाकार बहुत अच्छे हैं: सलमान

text: Kajol has said that both her children Nysa and Yug have been amazing teachers to her. She added, "I learn a lot from my kids... My daughter gives me super one-liners...and it makes so much sense." She further said Nysa and Yug have the ability to give her a new perspective on conversations.
summary: मेरे बच्चे निसा, युग मेरे लिए अद्भुत शिक्षक हैं: काजोल

text: Former Pakistani captain Waqar Younis on Monday took to Twitter to apologise for cutting cake on ex-captain Wasim Akram's birthday during Ramadan on Sunday. "We should've respected Ramadan and the people who were fasting...It was a poor act on our behalf," Younis wrote. Pakistani sports anchor Zainab Abbas had shared pictures of Akram's birthday celebrations on Twitter.
summary: यूनिस रमजान में अकरम के 'बी' केक काटने के लिए माफी मांगता है

text: Mumbai-based YouTuber Nikunj Lotia has booked an entire stand at the Mumbai Football Arena for Indian football team's match against Kenya on Monday. Nikunj requested fans to contact him for tickets and said he would give away 150 free tickets for the match. This comes after captain Sunil Chhetri urged Indians to watch their matches from the stadiums.
summary: छेत्री के समर्थन के लिए मैन बुक स्टैंड के बाद पूरा समर्थन करता है

text: Indian captain Virat Kohli has revealed that the longest he has run is for 20 minutes at 14 kmph, while the heaviest weight he has ever lifted is 145 kg deadlift. The 29-year-old said he feels like he is currently the fittest he has ever been and added that he does not look up to anyone for fitness.
summary: कोहली ने जो सबसे लंबा रन बनाया है, वह सबसे भारी है?

text: After PM Narendra Modi visited a mosque in Singapore, Congress leader Kamal Nath said, "Jis aadmi ne pure desh ko topi pehna di, woh khud topi pehne ya na pehne kya matlab." Nath's remarks came in response to a reporter's query about PM Modi not wearing skull caps in India but doing so when he is abroad.
summary: PM ne desh ko topi pehna di: पीएम मोदी की मस्जिद यात्रा पर बधाई

text: After meeting actor-turned-politician Kamal Haasan over the Cauvery Water Management Board, Karnataka CM Kumaraswamy said, "Both Karnataka and Tamil Nadu farmers are important." Meanwhile, Haasan said several lawyers advised him that the dispute between the two states should be settled outside court. The Supreme Court in February reduced Tamil Nadu's share of Cauvery water.

text: A six-year-old daughter of a migrant labourer was found with her throat slit and blood on her private parts at a Haryana farmhouse on Sunday. "In the preliminary investigations, it seems a case of murder after rape," the police said. An investigation is ongoing, and the police suspect the perpetrator could be one of the labourers living inside the farmhouse.
summary: गड्ढे में मिली 6 साल की बच्ची की लाश, पुलिस को लगा बलात्कार का शक

text: A man in Hyderabad was allegedly duped of Ã¢ÂÂ¹30 lakh on the pretext of a job at a five-star hotel in the US. He received the offer on a job portal and was asked to pay the money as fees for his application. He deposited the money in bank accounts that police believe are operated by a Nigerian national.

text: Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik on Monday ordered a judicial probe into the disappearance of the keys of the inner chambers of the Jagannath Temple's treasury. It had earlier emerged that keys of the chambers which were last opened in 1984 were missing. Meanwhile, the BJP and Congress slammed the government for alleged negligence towards the development of the 12th-century temple.

text: An 18-year-old NRI woman has claimed she was raped by her Punjab-based cousin and blackmailed into marriage because he wanted to get permanent residency in Canada. She claimed the accused and his family sedated her before the rape following which they used a video of the incident to blackmail her. Police booked the accused, who now resides in Australia.

text: Syrian President Bashar al-Assad plans to visit North Korean leader Kim Jong-un, North Korean state media said on Sunday. He will become the first head of state to meet Jong-un in North Korea since he came to power in 2011. Praising the North Korean leader, Assad said recent developments on the Korean peninsula were a result of Jong-un's "wise leadership".

text: Bihar's Kalpana Kumari has topped the medical entrance exam NEET 2018 with a percentile of 99.99. She scored 171 out of 180 in Physics, 160 out of 180 in Chemistry and 360 out of 360 in Biology (Biology and Zoology). Over 13 lakh candidates had registered for the exam, out of which 6.34 lakh candidates were able to pass it.
summary: बिहार की कल्पना कुमारी ने 99.99 प्रतिशत के साथ NEET 2018 में टॉप किया

text: A boulder-sized asteroid designated '2018 LA' was spotted hours before impact on Saturday by NASA-funded Catalina Sky Survey in Arizona. The asteroid entered Earth's atmosphere at a speed of 17 kilometres per second and burned up several miles above South Africa, creating a bright fireball in the sky. The asteroid was estimated to be about 2 metres across.

text: 'Makdee' actress Shweta Basu Prasad has confirmed that she is engaged to her longtime boyfriend, director Rohit Mittal. Shweta and Rohit have been in a relationship for around four years and she proposed to him in Goa, as per reports. They have worked together in some short films and were reportedly introduced to each other by director Anurag Kashyap.

text: Actress-filmmaker Angelina Jolie made her onscreen debut when she was 7 in a brief role in the 1982 film 'Lookin' to Get Out', where she played the onscreen daughter of her real-life father Jon Voight. text: Elon Musk-led space exploration startup SpaceX on Monday launched its pre-flown Falcon 9 rocket, carrying the SES-12 satellite to a Geostationary Transfer Orbit (GTO). The satellite, which was deployed about 32 minutes after liftoff, will provide data and video services throughout the Asia-Pacific region. However, SpaceX did not attempt to recover Falcon 9's first stage after launch.

text: JD(U) National General Secretary Pavan Varma has said Bihar CM Nitish Kumar will be the face of the NDA for the 2019 Lok Sabha elections in Bihar, adding, "JD(U) is the largest constituent of the coalition." He further said, "Kumar is the tallest leader and BJP, LJP and RLSP will have to approach the Lok Sabha polls under his leadership."
summary: 2019 चुनाव के लिए बिहार में NDA का चेहरा बने नीतीश कुमार: JD (U)

text: A Kolkata-based businessman died and a girl was injured after a Ã¢ÂÂ¹3-crore Ferrari they were driving crashed into a wall reportedly while trying to avoid a slowing truck on a flyover in Howrah. Reports said he had been driving the supercar at 150 kmph. The man died on the spot after waiting for an hour to be rescued.

text: The CBSE on Monday declared the results of the medical entrance exam National Eligibility Entrance Test (NEET) 2018. More than 13.2 lakh candidates had registered for exam, which was conducted on May 6 across 2,255 examination centres in the country. Earlier, the Supreme Court had refused to put a stay on the declaration of the results.
summary: CBSE ने मेडिकल प्रवेश परीक्षा NEET 2018 के परिणाम घोषित किए

text: Over 1,400 people have been put under quarantine in their own homes amid the Nipah virus outbreak in Kerala, an official said. They have been asked to report any symptoms of the virus to health officials. At least 18 people in the state have died due to the virus, including a nurse who treated Nipah virus patients.
summary: निप्पा वायरस के ऊपर केरल में 1400 लोग घर से संगरोध कर रहे हैं

text: Indian Union Muslim League MLA Parakkal Abdulla attended the Kerala Assembly on Monday wearing a mask and gloves to highlight the impact of the Nipah virus. Abdulla said this was a symbolic gesture as everyone in Kozhikode was wearing masks. He was slammed by CM Pinarayi Vijayan for "trivialising" the issue, while Health Minister KK Shailaja called the act "ridiculous."

text: Warning that the good times for illegal migrants are over, Italian Interior Minister Matteo Salvini on Sunday said that they should pack their bags. Adding that Italy cannot be Europe's refugee camp, Salvini said, "It's too costly to keep them in Italy...I think it's better to spend money in the countries of origin."

text: Slamming tariffs imposed by the US on metal imports from the country, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has said that it is "insulting" that the US considers Canada a national security threat. Trudeau added that Canada would impose direct reciprocal tariffs on the US in retaliation. Meanwhile, the White House said the Canadian Prime Minister was "overreacting".
summary: यह अपमानजनक है कि अमेरिका कनाडा सुरक्षा खतरे को मानता है: ट्रूडो

text: Nobel Prize-winning nuclear disarmament group ICAN has offered to pay for the cost of the summit between US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un. "This is a historic meeting, and once in a generation opportunity," ICAN said. This comes amid reports that cash-strapped North Korea may have trouble bearing the cost of the summit.

text: Highlighting the widening skill gap in the IT industry, Tech Mahindra CEO CP Gurnani has said 94% of engineering graduates were not fit for hiring. Gurnani also said that the current infrastructure is creating more people for unemployment.

text: Reliance Jio has started hiring a team of professionals under Akash Ambani to work on Artificial Intelligence (AI), according to reports. text: Afghanistan pacer Shapoor Zadran's delivery to Bangladesh's Rubel Hossain broke the leg stump into two during the first T20I between the two sides on Sunday. text: Rohit Sharma on Sunday became the first Indian cricketer to throw the ceremonial 'first pitch' in a Major League Baseball match, achieving the feat ahead of the match between Seattle Mariners and Tampa BayÃÂ Rays. text: German table tennis player Timo Boll switched hands during a rally and still managed to win the point during the 2018 ITTF World Tour China Open. text: Former Australian captain Steve Smith has revealed that he "spent four days in tears" after the ball-tampering scandal in the Cape Town Test, that led to him being banned for a year. text: India restricted Thailand to 66/8 in 20 overs to win the match by 66 runs in the Women's T20 Asia Cup at Kuala Lumpur on Monday. summary: भारत ने थाईलैंड को 66/8 पर रोक दिया, एशिया कप में 66 रन से जीता

text: Two delivery drivers are taking legal action against Amazon's three delivery firms, claiming they were dismissed for complaining about working practices. text: Union Minister Vijay Goel on Sunday said that BJP's doors are open for suspended AAP leader Kapil Mishra. text: Claiming BJP makes empty promises, Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav said, "With empty stomach, people have now understood that the BJP does not mean business." text: Delhi's Social Welfare Department is planning to introduce a vocational skill development programme for people staying at government beggar homes. text: UK Secretary of State for International Trade Liam Fox has said the country won't sign any trade deal with the US following Brexit if it is not in its own interest. text: Afghanistan's 19-year-old spinner Rashid Khan became the world's fastest cricketer to reach 50 wickets in T20I cricket after reaching the milestone with a wicket on his first ball of the match against Bangladesh on Sunday. text: After spending 168 days aboard the International Space Station, NASA astronaut Scott Tingle, Japan's Norishige Kanai and Russian cosmonaut Anton Shkaplerov landed in Kazakhstan on Sunday. text: Union Culture and Environment Minister Mahesh Sharma has announced that a scientific study called colour stereography will be done on the Taj Mahal to determine its exact colour. text: Police have arrested seven people in Kerala's Kozhikode for forwarding fake news about the spread of Nipah virus through WhatsApp. A Junior Health Inspector also lodged a complaint about rumours that his staff had contracted the virus. text: Amid efforts to save the 2015 nuclear deal after US exit, Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif on Sunday said that the world should stand up to US' bullying behaviour. text: US President Donald Trump's lawyer Rudy Giuliani on Sunday said that the President probably has the power to pardon himself in the Russia probe. Earlier, Giuliani had said that a sitting President cannot be indicted.

text: In a bid to promote tourism, state-owned companies will soon conduct board meetings, conferences and strategic meetings at tourist spots, according to an official statement. text: Former Finance Minister P Chidambaram has said the Indian economy has become like a car whose three tyres are punctured. text: 'A Band Of Boys', a popular Indian band, is set to make a comeback with a new album. They will unveil the first song during a live performance on June 11 in Mumbai. text: A woman opened fire in San Diego, California, where thousands of people were participating in a city marathon, police have said. text: During the second England-Pakistan Test, cameras showed the top of the handle of batsman Jos Buttler's bat which had "F**k It" written on it. Reacting to it, a user tweeted, "Big fan of Buttler's own mental mantra...to refocus after each delivery." "Jos Buttler: I should bat sensibly with England 8 wickets down...*looks down at bat handle*," another user wrote.
summary: इंग्लैंड के बटलर ने अपने बल्ले के ऊपर 'F ** k It' लिखा है

text: Kagiso Rabada, who bagged six awards at Cricket South Africa's annual awards ceremony, mistakenly posed with 'Women's Cricketer of the Year' trophy. Reacting to it, a user tweeted, "He's so good he even won...Women's Cricketer of the Year". "This guy was on fire...he even changed his name to Dane Van Niekerk to go at it again next season," wrote another.
summary: रबाडा 'महिला क्रिकेटर ऑफ द ईयर' ट्रॉफी के साथ पोज देती हैं

text: After reading her upcoming French Open opponent and long-time rival Maria Sharapova's book, American tennis star Serena Williams said, "I didn't expect to be reading a book about me that wasn't necessarily true." Sharapova's book claims that Serena's dominance over her is because she defeated the American in Wimbledon 2004's final, which resulted in Serena crying in the locker room.
summary: आश्चर्य है कि शारापोवा की किताब मेरे बारे में बहुत कुछ थी: सेरेना

text: Indian football team is currently participating in the four-team Intercontinental Cup, which is being held at the Mumbai Football Arena in Mumbai. India will face Kenya on June 4 and New Zealand on June 7. India had defeated Chinese Taipei 5-0 in the first group match of the tournament on June 1, which witnessed a hat-trick by captain Sunil Chhetri.
summary: भारतीय फुटबॉल टीम के आगामी मैच कब हैं?

text: UFC fighter Jimmie Rivera's 20-match winning streak ended 33 seconds into the first round by opponent Marlon Moraes' high kick. Moraes' kick landed on Rivera's head which floored him following which Moraes attacked him with a slew of punches. After the win, the fifth-ranked Moraes' win-loss record reads 21-5, while the fourth-ranked Rivera now has a win-loss record of 21-2.
summary: UFC फाइटर ने 33 सेकेंड में प्रतिद्वंद्वी की 20 मैचों की जीत का सिलसिला समाप्त किया

text: Former Pakistani fast bowler Wasim Akram holds the record for smashing the highest score while batting at number eight in a Test match. Akram, who is celebrating his 52nd birthday today, smashed an unbeaten 257 off 363 balls including 12 sixes and 22 fours against Zimbabwe in 1996 to achieve the feat. Akram scored three tons in his Test career.
summary: एक बार टेस्ट में 8 वें नंबर पर बल्लेबाजी करते हुए अकरम ने 257 * रन बनाए

text: After post-mortem reports claimed that a BJP worker who was found hanging from an electricity pole in West Bengal had committed suicide, his father said that Trinamool Congress workers were responsible for his death. Dulal Kumar's father asked, "How can it be suicide when there was no problem in his life?" The BJP has called his death a "political murder".
summary: टीएमसी के लोगों ने बेटे को मार डाला: बीजेपी कार्यकर्ता के पिता को डब्ल्यूबी में लटका हुआ पाया गया

text: Former Central Information Commissioner (CIC) Shailesh Gandhi has said that any Information Officer who wilfully provides wrong information to an RTI application can be penalised and disciplinary action could be taken against him. Gandhi added that in cases where the mistake is genuine, the concerned department must give an explanation for the lapse as well as the correct information.
summary: आरटीआई में गलत जवाब देने पर जुर्माना लगाया जाएगा: पूर्व सीआईसी

text: A 23-year-old Army jawan was booked after he allegedly raped and impregnated a minor girl in Andhra Pradesh's Visakhapatnam after promising to marry her. The jawan's family reportedly refused to accept the victim's proposal for marriage and offered her money to terminate the pregnancy. The accused jawan, who hailed from Visakhapatnam and was posted in Kolkata, is currently absconding.
summary: सेना के जवान ने आंध्र में नाबालिग के साथ बलात्कार करने का मामला दर्ज किया

text: Customs officials on Saturday arrested the CEO of Plus Max, which operates a duty-free shop at the Trivandrum airport, for alleged tax evasion to the tune of Ã¢ÂÂ¹6 crore. R Sundaravasan allegedly used passport details of thousands of passengers to illegally divert foreign liquor to black market. Sale details and returns were allegedly fabricated to cover up the illegal sales.
summary: त्रिवेंद्रम शुल्क मुक्त दुकान के सीईओ ने ¢ Â‚Â¹6-cr कर चोरी के लिए आयोजित किया

text: An Indian man named Dickson Kattithara Abraham has won 10 million dirham (over Ã¢ÂÂ¹18 crore) in a lottery in Abu Dhabi. Abraham, who is based in Nigeria, had purchased the ticket when he was travelling through Abu Dhabi. Five other Indian participants also won smaller prizes that ranged from 30,000 dirham to 100,000 dirham. n
summary: भारतीय व्यक्ति अबू धाबी की लॉटरी में man crore18 करोड़ से अधिक जीतता है

text: Newly-appointed Karnataka CM HD Kumaraswamy has banned government officials from carrying mobile phones to their meetings with him, in order to enforce discipline. State Chief Secretary K Ratna Prabha said the move will ensure that officials effectively contribute to the discussions. Earlier, the state prohibited teachers from using their phones during school hours.
summary: K'taka मुख्यमंत्री ने अधिकारियों को बैठकों में ले जाने से प्रतिबंधित कर दिया

text: A senior scientist at the National Institute of Nutrition in Hyderabad was arrested on Saturday for allegedly sexually harassing a Dalit student. Fifty-eight-year-old K Bhaskarachary, who was supposed to guide the student on her dissertation, allegedly harassed her with obscene messages and threatened her. Bhaskarachary had already been suspended by the institution last month.
summary: दलित छात्र का यौन उत्पीड़न करने के लिए वरिष्ठ वैज्ञानिक आयोजित

text: Two Border Security Force (BFS) personnel were martyred in sniper fire by Pakistani forces late on Saturday, according to the BSF. At least 12 villagers were injured in the heavy shelling, it added. This comes four days after Pakistani Director General of Military Operations called up his Indian counterpart to restore the ceasefire agreement.
summary: पाकिस्तान की ओर से संघर्ष विराम उल्लंघन में 2 बीएसएफ कर्मी शहीद

text: Days after a 20-year-old woman was allegedly gangraped at a Goan beach, BJP leader Sulakshana Sawant said the government cannot provide security to every individual. Sawant said, "We need to change the mentality of the people." There is an increase in the number of rape cases being reported to the police as more women were reporting such crimes, she added..
summary: सरकार हर किसी को सुरक्षा नहीं दे सकती: समुद्र तट पर भाजपा नेता

text: US Defence Secretary James Mattis has said North Korea will get relief from sanctions only after it takes clear and irreversible steps to end its nuclear programme. He added that it will be a "bumpy road" to the nuclear negotiations with North Korea on June 12. His remarks follow President Donald Trump's meeting with senior North Korean official Kim Yong-chol.
summary: एन कोरिया के लिए कोई प्रतिबंध राहत नहीं है जब तक कि नाभिकीयकरण: यू.एस.

text: NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg has said that the alliance would not come to Israel's defence in case of an attack by Iran. "Israel is our partner, but not a member of NATO. The security guarantee does not apply to Israel," he added. Stoltenberg's statement comes amid heightened tensions between Israel and Iran.
summary: अगर ईरान हमला करता है तो गठबंधन इजरायल का बचाव नहीं करेगा: नाटो प्रमुख

text: Actor Akshay Kumar has said that endorsing a harmful product or service is incorrect. "I think audience also must understand whom to follow and whom not to follow," he added. He further urged celebrities not to endorse harmful services or products like alcohol and tobacco because people look up to them and imitate them.
summary: हानिकारक उत्पाद या सेवा का समर्थन करना गलत है: अक्षय

text: Researchers from CNRS in France have designed a flying robot 'Quad-Morphing' which can change its shape during flight. The robot, which has two rotating arms equipped with propellers, can reduce its wingspan in flight to navigate through tight spaces. Quad-Morphing, which can fly at a speed of 9 kmph, also features an autopilot system which activates arm reorientation.
summary: एरियल रोबोट जो विकसित किए गए अपने आकार को मध्य उड़ान में बदल सकता है

text: Madhya Pradesh Congress leader Jyotiraditya Scindia on Sunday claimed the party had found one voter registered in 26 lists after examining voter lists of all constituencies. He also questioned how the population increased by 24% in 10 years but voters increased by 40%. Further, party leader Kamal Nath said Election Commission has been given evidence of 60 lakh fake voters.
summary: मिला 1 मतदाता 26 एमपी मतदाता सूचियों में पंजीकृत: ईसी को कांग

text: West Bengal Police on Sunday said a 30-year-old BJP worker who was found hanging from a power transmission tower in Purulia the previous day had committed suicide. Another BJP worker was earlier found hanging from a tree, with a note on his shirt claiming that he was killed because of his political affiliation. BJP has termed the deaths "political murders".
summary: डब्ल्यूबी में फांसी पर लटका मिला भाजपा कार्यकर्ता आत्महत्या: पुलिस

text: A drone footage of the mouth of Hawaii's Kilauea volcano has revealed a crater measuring around 120 acres or roughly about the size of 90 American football fields. According to experts, explosions expanded the crater by 10 times its original size in the last month. The volcano has destroyed more than 80 homes since it first erupted four weeks ago.
summary: हवाई ज्वालामुखी पर बने 90 फुटबॉल मैदानों जितना बड़ा गड्ढा

text: The West Bengal Governor will be paid the highest allowance at Ã¢ÂÂ¹1.81 crore, while the Tamil Nadu Governor will get Ã¢ÂÂ¹1.66 crore and the Bihar Governor will be paid Ã¢ÂÂ¹1.62 crore, according to new government guidelines. These cover tours, maintenance of offices, hospitality and other expenses.  The allowances are paid by the state governments and were revised after four years.
summary: राज्यपालों को भत्ते के रूप में कितना भुगतान किया जाता है?

text: The VVIP aircraft carrying External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj from Trivandrum to Mauritius went out of contact for 12-14 minutes on Saturday, a senior official has said. The incident reportedly prompted a security scare as air traffic controllers could not establish contact with the aircraft after it entered Mauritian airspace. However, the MEA denied having any knowledge of the scare.
summary: सुषमा स्वराज का विमान 14 मिनट के लिए संपर्क से बाहर हो जाता है

text: Citing the example of North and South Korea becoming "friends" after 70 years, Jammu and Kashmir CM Mehbooba Mufti has sought an improvement in India-Pakistan relations. She said, "Shelling is still going on on our borders. People on that side are dying and people on this side are also dying." She called for an end to the shelling and bloodshed.
summary: यहां तक कि एस, एन कोरिया दोस्त बन गए, भारत-पाक संबंधों पर जम्मू-कश्मीर के मुख्यमंत्री का कहना है

text: Amid a night curfew imposed in Meghalaya's capital Shillong, CM Conrad Sangma said the issues which prompted violence can be resolved on a table and not on the streets. He added that reports about people being displaced and assaulted are untrue. However, defence officials said 500 people were placed in Army shelters after clashes erupted between Punjabi and Khasi communities.
summary: सड़कों पर विवाद नहीं सुलझा सकते: हिंसा पर मेघालय के मुख्यमंत्री

text: The Army has rescued 500 people from disturbed areas in Meghalaya's Shillong after incidents of violence and arson were reported amid communal clashes in the capital. Violence was triggered after an altercation between a Punjabi woman and a Khasi youth, following which a mob clashed with the police. Protestors torched shops, pelted stones and hurled petrol bombs at security personnel.
summary: सांप्रदायिक झड़पों के बीच सेना ने शिलांग में 500 लोगों को बचाया

text: A team of 30 people from China has cleared 8,500 kg of garbage from Mount Everest since April amid growing numbers of visitors. The garbage includes about 5,200 kg of household waste, 2,300 kg of human faeces, and 1,000 kg of mountaineering trash. China also plans to build environment friendly toilets and waste collection sites at Mount Everest.
summary: चीन ने माउंट एवरेस्ट से 8,500 किलोग्राम कचरा साफ किया

text: Actress Tamannaah Bhatia has said that a film is not just about the art form but also how it fares at the box office. "It's part of the business...When it comes to a character, I make sure that it adds to the plot," she added. She further said she has accepted small roles in good, content-driven films.
summary: फिल्म केवल कला रूप के बारे में नहीं है, लेकिन यह कैसे किराए पर है: तमन्नाह

text: Rajkummar Rao and Bhumi Pednekar will star opposite each other in Karan Johar's next production where Kareena Kapoor Khan and Akshay Kumar will be playing the lead roles, as per reports. The film is said to revolve around two couples in modern relationships. Kareena and Akshay will reportedly be playing the older couple trying to have a child.
summary: राव, करीना में भूमि, जोहर के साथ अक्षय की अगली फिल्म: रिपोर्ट

text: World number one tennis player Rafael Nadal portrayed Colombian singer Shakira's love interest in the official video of her 2009 song 'Gypsy'. "Shakira, as always, was spectacular. Working with a woman as charming as her, well, it makes it a lot easier," Nadal had said. The 16-time Grand Slam champion is celebrating his 32nd birthday today.
summary: नडाल ने एक बार शकीरा की संगीत वीडियो में रुचि को दर्शाया था

text: Talking about rumours about him dating Disha Patani, actor Tiger Shroff said, "People like to write things about us, it's fine, maybe they get something out of it- money or some sort of pleasure." He added that he doesn't want to shut up anyone or clarify anything because he does not want to take someone's bread-and-butter away.
summary: हो सकता है कि लोगों को Disha: Tiger के साथ लिंक-अप के बारे में लिखने का पैसा मिले

text: Amitabh Bachchan, who completed 45 years of his marriage with wife Jaya Bachchan on Sunday, wrote in a blog post at midnight, "Time to call the wife who travels and to wish her for the years together." Sharing an old picture with Jaya on Twitter, he thanked fans who sent him greetings and flowers on the occasion of their anniversary.
summary: जया को एक साथ 45 साल के लिए शुभकामनाएं: सालगिरह पर बिग बी

text: South Africa's Dale Steyn has revealed AB de Villiers "almost fell flat on his face" while going out to bat before scoring the fastest ODI ton at the Wanderers in 2015. Steyn added ABD rushed out of the change room as he was reluctant. "As he ran out, he almost saw his arse on the (stairs') first step," Steyn added.
summary: सबसे तेज ODI टन: स्टेन से पहले ABD उनके चेहरे पर लगभग गिर गया था

text: Cricketer Suresh Raina on Sunday took to Twitter to urge fans to support Sunil Chhetri and Indian football team for their "amazing efforts and progress". Raina also shared the video of Chhetri, wherein the football team captain urged countrymen to support them by watching their matches from stadiums. Earlier, Virat Kohli had urged Indians to take notice of Chhetri.
summary: रैना ने छेत्री का वीडियो साझा किया, प्रशंसकों से उनका समर्थन करने का आग्रह किया

text: Union Minister for Minority Affairs Mukhtar Abbas Naqvi on Sunday said minorities are safer in India than in any other democratic country. He added, "Unfortunately some forces, especially political, are trying to create an atmosphere of fear to disturb the development, peace and prosperity." He further said that people who try to create an atmosphere of fear would not succeed.
summary: भारत में अल्पसंख्यक सुरक्षित हैं, मुख्तार अब्बास नकवी कहते हैं

text: Wishing DMK chief M Karunanidhi on his 95th birthday, PM Narendra Modi tweeted, "A prolific writer, poet, thinker and orator, Karunanidhi Ji is one of India's senior most political leaders." Congress President Rahul Gandhi tweeted, "I pray for his good health and happiness, always." The ex-Tamil Nadu CM joined the state Assembly in 1957 and has never lost an election.
summary: पीएम मोदी ने 95 वें जन्मदिन पर द्रमुक प्रमुख करुणानिधि को शुभकामनाएं दीं

text: Railway Minister Piyush Goyal has warned heads of zonal railways that delays in train services will defer their appraisal proportionately, a senior official has said. Goyal gave the zonal general managers a month to improve punctuality and told them they couldn't blame maintenance work for the delays. Notably, as many as 30% trains were running late in the 2017-18 fiscal.
summary: अधिकारियों की पदोन्नति के लिए ट्रेन देरी

text: Slamming political parties for opposing Electronic Voting Machines (EVMs), Chief Election Commissioner Om Prakash Rawat has said, "Political parties that cannot take defeat need to blame someone." Stating that EVMs and Voter Verifiable Paper Audit Trail (VVPAT) machines allow the EC to announce poll results within hours, he added that the machines enhance the transparency in the voting process.
summary: वे पार्टियां जो हार का दोष नहीं ले सकतीं EVMs: EC

text: The UN Human Rights Commission experts have condemned the police firing that took place in Tamil Nadu's Tuticorin during the anti-Sterlite protests in which at least 13 people were killed. The experts also called upon the Indian authorities to ensure an "independent and a transparent" investigation into the incident. Meanwhile, the state government has permanently shut down the Sterlite plant.
summary: संयुक्त राष्ट्र के विशेषज्ञों ने तूतीकोरिन पुलिस गोलीबारी की निंदा की जिसमें 13 मारे गए

text: Union IT Minister Ravi Shankar Prasad has said, "Artificial Intelligence should be used for governance...for improvement." Dismissing concerns that technology may displace jobs, he added, "If a person is not up to date in new technology, then he may have a problem. You have to be tuned to the new technology."
summary: शासन, सुधार के लिए एआई का उपयोग किया जाना चाहिए: आईटी मंत्री

text: Delhi Environment Minister Imran Hussain has called for requesting agencies like the forest department and municipal corporations for arranging water for birds and animals during the summer months. Adding that various species of birds and animals enrich the biodiversity, Hussain said, "There have been cases in the past where birds have died due to thirst, scarcity of water."
summary: दिल्ली सरकार ने पक्षियों, जानवरों के लिए पानी की व्यवस्था करने का आह्वान किया

text: The Maldives government has issued a notice seeking $20.5 million towards income tax and penalties from GMR Male International Airport, a GMR Group company. The company had won $271 million arbitration against the wrongful termination of Male International Airport contract. A GMR spokesperson has refuted the tax claim as the group company has no business operations in the island nation.
summary: मालदीव सरकार ने जीएमआर पर $ 20.5 मिलियन आयकर नोटिस थप्पड़ मारे

text: State-owned ONGC has incurred a Ã¢ÂÂ¹4,000-crore loss on natural gas output in FY18 as the government mandated price for the fuel was less than the cost of production. "We need at least $4 per million British thermal unit (mmBtu) to break-even compared to current price of $3.06," an official said. Notably, ONGC produces around 75% of India's natural gas output.
summary: ओएनजीसी ने प्राइस कैप के कारण गैस उत्पादन पर GC inc inc 4000,000r का नुकसान उठाया

text: Tamil actress Sangeetha Balan, who is known for her role TV serials including 'Vani Rani', has been arrested for allegedly running a prostitution racket in a private resort in Chennai. Many young actresses were reportedly involved in prostitution. Women from various states, especially from North India, were rescued and sent to a rehabilitation center.
summary: तमिल अभिनेत्री संगीता को वेश्यावृत्ति के रैकेट चलाने के आरोप में गिरफ्तार

text: 'Main Badhiya Tu Bhi Badhiya', the first song from Ranbir Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor starrer 'Sanju' has been released.  Sonu Nigam and Sunidhi Chauhan have sung it while it has been composed by music director duo Rohan-Rohan with lyrics by Puneet Sharma. Directed by Rajkumar Hirani, the film also stars Paresh Rawal, Manisha Koirala, Vicky Kaushal and Dia Mirza.
summary: 'संजू' का 'मैं बधिया तू भी बधिया' गाना रिलीज

text: Boxing legend Muhammad Ali, who passed away on June 3, 2016, once dodged 21 punches in 10 seconds as a 35-year-old fighting against then 19-year-old Michael Dokes. Ali, who was cornered in the ring, did a mock dance after Dokes missed the punches. Two years earlier, Dokes had claimed his hands are "so fast they can't catch them on film".
summary: देखिए मुहम्मद अली ने 10 सेकंड में 21 घूंसे मारे

text: University of Tokyo researchers have demonstrated a way to maintain living tissue on a robotic joint to make life-like robots. They constructed a metal and plastic robot skeleton with muscle precursor cells, which were fitted with electrodes to allow the skeleton to move. The muscle-robot which was tested resembled a human finger and successfully picked up and moved a ring.
summary: रोबोट पर काम करने वाले शोधकर्ताओं ने जीवित मांसपेशियों के ऊतकों के साथ फिट किया

text: Italian luxury vehicle manufacturer Maserati has announced plans to launch the Alfieri electric sports car which can go from 0-100 kmph in under 2 seconds. The car, which will offer 300 kmph top speed, will feature a transmission supplied by Ferrari and a coupe or open-top version. The Alfieri was first unveiled four years ago as a concept car.
summary: मासेराती इलेक्ट्रिक कार की पुष्टि करता है जो 2 एस में 0-100 किमी प्रति घंटे कर सकती है

text: A Delhi court has held that a father's maintenance payments towards his child cannot be limited to two meals a day and should be determined by what the child would have enjoyed if they lived together. This came as the court rejected a man's plea against a lower court order directing him to pay Ã¢ÂÂ¹12,000 per month as child maintenance.
summary: एक दिन में केवल 2 भोजन के लिए बच्चे के लिए पिता का रखरखाव: कोर्ट

text: The government transport office in Uttar Pradesh's Mathura has issued driving licences to two people who had passed away in separate road accidents in 2017. The Assistant Regional Transport Officer Babita Verma has said a show cause notice for the error was served to the concerned clerk, who has avoided it by taking leaves.
summary: मथुरा में 2 मृत लोगों को ड्राइविंग लाइसेंस जारी

text: Indian Medical Association President Ravi Wankhedkar on Saturday said Nipah virus is no longer a threat in Kerala, adding that 300 doctors from across the nation have arrived in the state. The virus has claimed 18 lives in Kerala. However, state Health Minister KK Shailaja said people need to be careful as around 2,000 people were exposed to the virus.
summary: केरल में अब निप्पा वायरस का खतरा नहीं: मेडिकल बॉडी

text: India successfully test-fired the indigenously developed and nuclear-capable Long Range Ballistic Missile Agni 5 on Sunday. This was the sixth trial of the surface-to-surface missile, which has a strike range of 5,000 km. Agni 5 is the most advanced missile with new technologies in terms of navigation and guidance, warhead, and engine, Defence Research and Development Organisation officials said.
summary: परमाणु-सक्षम अग्नि 5 मिसाइल का सफलतापूर्वक परीक्षण किया गया

text: A Hyatt Regency Hotel valet in Sydney, Australia, managed to crash a Porsche Carrera while parking the car, resulting in wedging the sports car underneath another vehicle. The valet had to be rescued through the car's shorn roof and was not injured in the incident. A witness claimed the valet must have "panicked" and accelerated the Porsche under the car.
